entry.title: Wuthering Waves Battle Rush
entry.content:
Dear Rovers,
The Wuthering Waves Battle Rush is now live! Record and share your most exciting battle moments with the hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle on X (Twitter)/YouTube Shorts/TikTok to win Astrite x2,000 and a chance to be featured on our social media with direct credits! Other than these rewards, 10 extra winners will be selected to receive a $50 Amazon Gift Card.
Showcase your outstanding battle tactics in a condensed clip and share them with us!
**Content Requirement**
Create your own combat video featuring Wuthering Waves.
We require no limits to the characters, level, or scenes. All entries that feature your combat in Wuthering Waves are qualified to join the event and compete for rewards!
**How to Submit**
Post your work on X (Twitter)/YouTube Shorts/TikTok with both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle included publicly.
**Submission Period**
2024/06/30 - 2024/08/11 08:59 (PT)
**Judging Criteria**
All eligible works will undergo evaluation based on their adherence to the theme, degree of completion, reception among players, and other relevant factors.
**Notes**
1. To qualify for participation, you should include both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle in your post.
2. Deleted posts will not be qualified for entitlement of rewards.
3. You can submit multiple entries. However, the same work published on different platforms will not count towards the rewards.
4. Entries listed below may be excluded from the judging process:
\*Works not created in accordance with Wuthering Waves
\*Works found to contain plagiarism or infringement of intellectual property rights
\*Works submitted outside the event period
\*Works created with the assistance of AI technology
\*Works featuring extremely aggressive content, including but not limited to themes of pornography, violence, politics, or racism
\*Works that have already been used for commercial purposes
\*Works deemed inappropriate by the judges
5. Failure to reply to the official staff within 7 days from the date of notification will be considered a waiver of entitlement to the rewards.
6. This event is open to submissions from all languages, as creators proficient in any language are eligible to compete for rewards. Entries differing only in language will be treated as equivalent works.

entry.title: Wuthering Waves Developer's Message Vol. 4: Version 1.2 Optimization Preview With A Special Note From Developers
entry.content:
Dear Rover:
Wuthering Waves Version 1.2 "In the Turquoise Moonglow" is on the horizon. Here's a sneak peek at the upcoming improvements and a special note from the dev team.
**✦ Version 1.2 Optimization Preview ✦**
**1. New Custom Lock-On Feature**
In Version 1.1, we implemented several quality-of-life improvements to the auto lock-on system, including optimizations for Resonators and some Echo skills. With the release of Version 1.2, you'll gain access to the new Custom Lock-On feature under Settings - Control. This option allows you to set the auto lock-on priorities for enemies based on your combat preferences.
**2. New Utility Hoverdroid: Shooter**
We've heard your feedback regarding the need to frequently switch between teams when there are no pistol-using Resonators available for challenges like the Photonvault and similar puzzles. In Version 1.2, you'll be able to use the new Hoverdroid: Shooter Utility.
Once the Utilities feature is available, you can equip the Hoverdroid: Shooter in the Utility Wheel. To shoot with the Hoverdroid, simply tap or hold the Basic Attack button.
More Hoverdroid features are under development. We hope this new addition will help your better explore Solaris.
**3. New Feature to Store Excess Waveplate**
A new feature to store excess Waveplates will be introduced in Version 1.2. Once you reach the Waveplate cap, you will receive Waveplate Crystals instead. These Crystals can be exchanged for Waveplates of equivalent value.
※ You will regenerate 1 Waveplate Crystal every 12 minutes, up to 480 Waveplate Crystals. Once this limit is reached, you will not gain additional Waveplate Crystals.
**4. New Resonator Showcase Feature**
With the release of Version 1.2, you can view and display the Convene scenes of unlocked Resonators with the Resonator Showcase feature.
※ Tap the avatar on the Terminal screen to open the Resonator Showcase. You can display up to 3 selected Resonators here.
**5. Option to Play at 120 FPS**
The 120 FPS option will be available on select PC devices in Version 1.2. Stay tuned for our official announcements for more availability details.
**6. New [Depths of Illusive Realm] Store Rewards**
Thank you for your love and support for Depths of Illusive Realm. As we approach the final stages of Version 1.1's Dreams Ablaze in Darkness event, the White Cat will bring new exchange items to the Illusive Store.
To help you try out and level up more Resonators, we will add more exchange items to the Illusive Store in subsequent versions of the Depths of Illusive Realm event. These items will be available as the Convene events for the second half of each version are released.
You will receive a system mail reminder after the exchange items are added. Please remember to exchange the rewards after fully exploring Depths of Illusive Realm.
**7. More Guidebook Activity Points from a Daily Quest**
With the release of Version 1.2, the Activity Points reward for the "Spend 180 Waveplates" daily quest will be increased from +20 to +60. We hope this change will help you complete your daily Activity Points quests more quickly.
**✦ A Special Note from Developers✦**
Version 1.2 "In the Turquoise Moonglow" is coming soon. In this update, we'll introduce the Moon-Chasing Festival event and dedicate ourselves to address any issues that have impacted your experience so far.
We're well aware that many aspects of Wuthering Waves still have room for improvement, and we're committed to listening to your feedback to continually optimize and enhance the game. Together, we aim to create a better Solaris-3 and offer you more thrilling adventures.
We are also excited to announce that everyone will receive the 5-Star Resonator Xiangli Yao for free during the second half of Version 1.2. Stay tuned for more detailed event information!
We sincerely hope to join you on your adventures and look forward to your progress and growth in Wuthering Waves. Thank you again for your dedication and support!

entry.title: Wuthering Waves Version 1.2 Update Maintenance Notice
entry.content:
Dear Rover,
To bring you exciting new content and a better gaming experience, we will soon be conducting the update maintenance for Version 1.2: In the Turquoise Moonglow.
During the maintenance, you will be unable to log in to the game, so please plan your time accordingly. Additionally, due to the large size of the update, we recommend updating the game while connected to a Wi-Fi network. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
**[Maintenance Time & Compensation Details]**
✦ Maintenance Time: 2024-08-15 06:00 to 2024-08-15 13:00 (UTC+8)
✦ Maintenance Compensation: Astrite x300, Crystal Solvent x2
✦ Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2024-08-15 06:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the Version 1.3 update.
※ In the event that the maintenance is extended, the dev team will issue a follow-up notice and adjust the compensation accordingly.
※ Please note that the compensation will be sent via in-game mail within 6 hours after the maintenance is completed and the server is back online. The mail will remain valid for 30 days.
**[How to Update]**
Once the maintenance for the version update begins, you can follow the following instructions to update your client.
✦ Android: Launch the game and follow the instructions in the update pop-up window to complete the update.
✦ iOS: Update the game in the App Store.
✦ PC: Close the game, restart the launcher, and then click on "Update."
**[Version 1.2 Preview]**
✦ New Resonators: 5-Star Resonators - Zhezhi, Xiangli Yao
✦ New Weapons: 5-Star Weapons - Rime-Draped Sprouts, Verity's Handle
✦ New Events: By Moon's Grace - A Moon-Chasing Festival event, Converging Paths - Preparation of the Moon-Chasing Festival celebrations, Carnival in Slumberland - Latest Depths of Illusive Realm content, Do Echoids Dream of Electric Sheep - A time-limited defense-focused event
✦ New Stories: Zhezhi's Companion Story - True Colors, Exploration Quests - Vigil of Endless Night
✦ Other New Content: Returnee Event - Reprise of Tides, Phantom Appearance - Phantom: Dreamless, Utility - Hoverdroid: Shooter
※ For more details on the new content, optimizations, and bug fixes coming to the game in Version 1.2: In the Turquoise Moonglow, please stay tuned for the upcoming release notes.
**[Device Requirements]**
To ensure a smooth experience, please refer to the following requirements:
① Minimum
Android: [System] Android 7.0 or later; [Processor] Snapdragon 835, MediaTek G71/72 or processors of better/equivalent performance; [RAM] 4 GB or more
iOS: [System] iOS 14 or later; [Model] iPhone 11 or newer, iPad with A13 Bionic or processors of better/equivalent performance; [RAM] 4 GB or more
PC: [System] Windows 10 64-bit; [CPU] Intel I5 (9th Gen)/Ryzen 2700; [GPU] Geforce 1060/RX570/Intel ARC A380, [RAM] 16 GB or more
② Recommended
Android: [System] Android 7.0 or later; [Processor] Snapdragon Gen1+/Gen2/Gen3 or MediaTek processors of better/equivalent performance; [RAM] 6 GB or more
iOS: [System] iOS 15 or later; [Model] iPhone 13 or newer, iPad with A15 Bionic or processors of better/equivalent performance; [RAM] 6 GB or more
PC: [System] Windows 10 64-bit; [CPU] Intel I7 (9th Gen)/Ryzen 3700, [GPU] Geforce 2060/RX5700XT/Intel ARC A750; [RAM] 16 GB or more

**✦Eligibility✦**
Reach Union Level 8 or complete the combat trial in First Resonance and activate Convene function.
**✦Convene Rules✦**
- [Absolute Pulsation] is a Featured Weapon Convene event.
- Use Forging Tide to convene. You are guaranteed at least one 4-Star or higher rarity Resonator or Weapon every 10 attempts.
- The guarantee count is shared among all Featured Weapon Convene events and is carried over until a 5-Star Weapon is obtained.
- The 5-Star Weapon you Convene is guaranteed to be Rime-Draped Sprouts.
- Featured Weapon Rime-Draped Sprouts is exclusive to the Featured Weapon Convene and will not be available by other means once the event ends.
※For more details, please refer to the Convene screen in-game.

entry.title: Version 1.2: In the Turquoise Moonglow Patch Notes
entry.content:
Dear Rovers,
Thank you for your steadfast support! We are excited to announce that Version 1.2 In the Turquoise Moonglow will be available soon!
**Maintenance Duration & Compensations**
✦Maintenance Duration: 2024-08-15 06:00 to 2024-08-15 13:00 (UTC+8)
✦Maintenance Compensations: Astrite x300, Crystal Solvent x2
✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mail function before 2024-08-15 06:00 (UTC+8). The compensation is valid until the update to Version 1.3.
※ In the event that the maintenance is extended, the dev team will issue a follow-up notice and adjust the compensation accordingly.
✦Bug Fixes Compensation: Astrite x300
✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mail function before 2024-08-15 06:00 (UTC+8). The compensation is valid until the update to Version 1.3.
※ The compensation mail will be sent within 6 hours after the maintenance is completed. The mail will remain valid for 30 days."
**Version Update Details**
**✦New Resonators✦**
5-Star Resonator: Zhezhi (Glacio)
An artist for hire trying to make a living. Reserved and timid, she is not good with words but speaks volumes through her art, where her creations come to life with impossible authenticity.
✦Combat Role: Concerto Efficiency, Basic Attack DMG, Coordinated Attack, Glacio DMG Amplification, Resonance Skill DMG Amplification
※ Obtainable through the [Chromatic Prose] Featured Resonator Convene.
5-Star Resonator: Xiangli Yao (Electro)
Principal Investigator at Huaxu Academy's Jinzhou Campus, and the Academy's youngest multi-disciplinary scientist. A gentle soul with a sharp mind, whose relentless passion for Automata Mechanics always translates into constructive findings and insights.
✦Combat Role: Main Damage Dealer, Resonance Liberation DMG
※ Obtainable through the [Celestial Revelation] Featured Resonator Convene.
**✦New Weapons✦**
5-Star Weapon: Rime-Draped Sprouts (Rectifier)
An artist's seal adorned with rimed sprouts. It is stamped on numerous paintings that capture mountains and ravines in expressive, mesmerizing strokes. The tender sprouts symbolize the perpetual blossoming of artistic marvels.
※ Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation: Rime-Draped Sprouts] Featured Weapon Convene.
5-Star Weapon: Verity's Handle (Gauntlets)
Crafted with the lost art from the Court of Savantae, these gauntlets are solid and unbreakable, despite their lightweight materials. They are no tools of violence or aggression, but instruments for unraveling puzzles and pursuing the truth.
※ Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation: Verity's Handle] Featured Weapon Convene.
**✦New Events✦**
[By Moon's Grace] Moon-Chasing Festival Themed Event
The Moon-Chasing Festival is a Huanglong traditional festival that features various origin stories, with the most popular being the tale of The Fox and the Moon. On this special night, families and friends come together to admire the moon and make wishes, expressing their hopes for a brighter future.
✦Schedule: After the Version 1.2 update to 2024-09-28 15:59 (Server Time)
✦Prerequisite: Reach Union Level 17 and complete Main Quest Chapter 1 Act 3: Ominous Star.
※ For an enhanced experience, it is recommended to complete Main Quest Chapter 1 Act 7: Thaw of Eons first.
[Converging Paths] Moon-Chasing Festival Preparation Event
Complete Wishes and build Stalls to earn Popularity for the Moon-Chasing Festival. From 2024-09-07 10:00 to 2024-09-28 11:59 (Server Time), players with enough Popularity can claim the 5-Star Resonator Xiangli Yao for free.
✦Schedule: 2024-09-04 10:00 to 2024-09-28 11:59 (Server Time)
[Gifts of Lunar Radiance] 7-Day Login Event
During the event, log in to the game and check in on the in-game event page to get rewards for the days you have checked in.
✦Rewards: Radiant Tide x5, Lustrous Tide x5
✦Schedule: After the Version 1.2 update to 2024-09-28 03:59 (Server Time)
All-New Installment: [Carnival in Slumberland] Comes to [Depths of Illusive Realm]!
Illusive Echo: Dreamless and new Metaphors are now available.
Explore all-new scenes and face off against new enemies! Join the grand banquet of dreams to uncover deeper secrets!
New Available Resonators: Zhezhi, Xiangli Yao, Yuanwu, and Danjin.
✦Schedule: 2024-08-22 10:00 to 2024-09-23 03:59 (Server Time)
[Do Echoids Dream of Electric Sheep?] Limited-time Defense Event
Enter the special Simulation Challenges to protect the experimental device from destruction until all TDs are eliminated. Cosmos will provide Echoids to significantly boost Resonators' combat power.
✦Schedule: 2024-09-05 10:00 to 2024-09-26 03:59 (Server Time)
[Alloy Smelt II] Limited-time Battle Challenge
Experiment with different team lineups and activate various buffs to defeat enemies more efficiently.
✦Schedule: 2024-09-16 10:00 to 2024-09-28 03:59 (Server Time)
**✦New Story✦**
Zhezhi's Companion Story: True Colors
What does it really mean to create? Will an artist yet again caught up in the past accusations, find the courage to confront her past mistakes and tap into her emotions and talents, and continue to breathe new life into her paintings?
✦Available Time: Permanently available after the Version 1.2 update
✦Prerequisite: Reach Union Level 22 and complete the Moon-Chasing Festival ""Wish Upon the Moon I: Cry of the Soul"" quest.
Exploration Quest: Vigil of Endless Night
You've acquired a mysterious key from Chenpi. It seems to unlock a secret door covered in dust for ages.
✦Available Time: Permanently available after the Version 1.2 update
✦Prerequisite: Complete Main Quest Chapter 1 Act 7: Thaw of Eons.
**✦Other New Content✦**
✦New Returnee Event: [Reprise of Tides]
✦New Phantom Appearance: [Phantom: Dreamless]
✦New Utility: [Hoverdroid: Shooter]"
**Adjustments and Optimizations**
**✦Resonators & Echoes✦**
- Added Resonators' voicelines that play when switching between Resonators on the Resonators screen.
- Optimized the Resonators' Dodge mechanics in combat, allowing consecutive dodges to trigger a successful Dodge.
- Optimized the performance of certain actions while Resonators are sliding down.
- Optimized the animation performance of Rover: Havoc (Male)'s Resonance Liberation.
- Optimized the model performance of Rover: Havoc (Female)'s Basic Attack 2.
- Optimized Jiyan's model performance on certain devices.
- Optimized the anti-aliasing performance for some Resonator models on certain devices.
- Optimized the action performance of Echo: Lightcrusher.
**✦System✦**
Store Excess Waveplate:
New Feature to Store Excess Waveplate
- Added the Waveplate Crystal count, and Waveplate Crystals can be exchanged for Waveplates of equivalent value.
- The current counts of both Waveplates and Waveplate Crystals can be viewed on the Map screen.
- Once you reach the Waveplate cap, you'll begin receiving Waveplate Crystals instead, which regenerate at a rate of 1 Crystal every 12 minutes.
Terminal:
New Resonator Showcase Feature
- Tap the avatar on the Terminal screen to open the Resonator Showcase.
- You can display the convene animation of up to 3 selected Resonators here.
Exploration:
New Utility Hoverdroid: Shooter
- Unlock the Utilities feature to automatically obtain Hoverdroid: Shooter.
※ In shooting challenges or puzzles, you'll be able to use the new Hoverdroid: Shooter with any Resonator, instead of switching to a pistol-using Resonator.
Returnee Event:
New Returnee Event: Reprise of Tides
Meet specific requirements to activate the Returnee Event. Earn the corresponding rewards by either checking in or completing quests.
- Reach Union Level 8.
- At least 30 days since the last game login.
- At least 30 days since last activating the Reprise of Tides event.
※ Meet all the above requirements to activate the Reprise of Tides event. The event will last for 14 days after activation.
Mail:
Optimized the text content of certain notification mails.
**✦Leveling✦**
SOL3 Phase:
Optimized the quantity of material drops from completing various levels in the Recurring Challenges after reaching SOL3 Phase 8.
Daily Activity Points:
Increased the Activity Points reward for the ""Spend 180 Waveplates"" daily quest from 20 to 60.
Data Bank:
Optimized the sorting feature in Data Bank > Echo Gallery.
**✦Controls✦**
Custom Lock-On:
- Added three Lock-On Priority options: Movement Direction, Camera Direction, and Distance. You can set your preference under Settings > Control > Lock-On Priority.
- Optimized the auto lock-on logic for certain Echo Skills.
**Controller Support:**
- Added configuration options for the Select and Switch Target functions when using a controller.
- Added the function to zoom in and out on the Map screen using the right joystick of the controller.
- Optimized the input sensitivity for the left and right joysticks on the controller.
- Optimized the text scrolling speed for the left and right joysticks on the controller.
- Optimized certain controls for pistol-using Resonators when using a controller.
- Optimized the controls on specific screens when using a controller.
- Optimized the wheel function when using a controller.
① Added red dot notifications for the system function wheel.
② Added the option to trigger the selected function upon releasing the right joystick, which can be enabled or disabled in the wheel configuration screen.
③ Optimized the wheel configuration screen and adjusted the range of the selection tool.
**✦Challenges, Puzzles, and Events✦**
- Added the Fast Travel function in the Weekly Challenge: Destined Confrontation instance.
- Optimized the interactive experience when claiming rewards upon completing the challenge in the Weekly Challenge: Destined Confrontation instance.
- Optimized the descriptions of the Stage 4 effects for Phantom Echo: Inferno Rider in the Depths of Illusive Realm event. This optimization does not affect the actual effect.
**✦UI✦**
- Added an effect icon for the Outro Skill on the main screen, which now indicates the current active status.
- Added a shortcut for Data Merge on the Echo Equipment screen.
- Added an exclusive screen and shortcut for Tower of Adversity on the Event screen.
- Added a Co-op Mode status indicator on the Terminal screen. Tapping it will exit Co-op Mode.
- Optimized the UI display effect of the Co-op Mode system.
- Optimized the UI display and interactive experience of the Targeted Convene events.
- Optimized the UI display and interaction for selecting dialogue options when playing across platforms.
**✦Other✦**
- Optimized the left joystick controls on mobile devices and reduced the range of accidental operations.
- Optimized the waiting time for story dialogues.
**✦Pack adjustment✦**
- Due to regional restrictions, the [Blake Bloom's Data Aid] pack will be removed from the Store following this update. We appreciate your understanding.
**✦Graphics & Performance✦**
- Optimized game performance for select mobile devices.
- Added the Enemy On-Hit Material Effects options in Settings > Graphics.
- The 120 FPS option will be available on select PC devices in Settings > Graphics.
To enable the 120 FPS option, both of the following system requirements must be fulfilled:
① Graphics Card: Supported NVIDIA RTX 30 series, RTX 40 series, or AMD RX 6000 series, RX 7000 series.
② CPU: Supported Intel or AMD model.
※ Depending on your system specifications and environment, enabling the 120 FPS option may cause performance issues or hardware errors. If you experience such problems, please disable the option and restart the game. If the issues persist, please send your feedback to Customer Service.
※ Meanwhile, we will continue to enhance game performance and address issues based on your feedback. We will expand support to more devices in future versions.

**Bug Fixes**
**Resonators**
- Fixed the issue where Changli's Dodge Counter ""True Sight: Charge"" did not correctly recover a stack of Enflamement on hit.
- Fixed the issue where, in certain situations, Changli's eye patch model would display abnormally after accumulating four stacks of Enflamement.
- Fixed the issue where Jinhsi would land abnormally when executing a Mid-air Attack.
- Fixed the issue in Jinhsi's battle against TD: Traffic Illuminator where she would freeze abnormally upon casting Resonance Skill: Illuminous Epiphany, preventing her from performing other actions.
- Fixed the visual anomalies with Jinhsi's certain skill effects on mobile devices.
- Fixed the issue where the Tacet Mark Effect would display abnormally when her Resonance Liberation energy was full.
- Fixed the issue in Yinlin's battle against TD: Tempest Mephis where the attack range would be abnormal in certain situations.
- Fixed an issue where certain damage types cannot trigger the Coordinated Attack inflicted by the Punishment Mark of Resonator Yinlin's Forte Chameleon Cipher.

- Fixed the visual anomalies with TD Baby Viridblaze Saurian's attack special effect.
- Fixed the issue where Bell-Borne Geochelone would not enter battle in certain situations.
- Fixed the issue where, in certain situations, when Echo: Bell-Borne Geochelone cast its Echo Skill again during the effect duration, the duration did not reset.
**System**
- Fixed the issue where, in certain situations, the screen might turn black when starting the game.
- Fixed the issue where, when using Lootmapper, the Supply Chest icon on the minimap might not disappear correctly after the Supply Chest was opened.
- Fixed the issue where, in the Map function, Custom Markers would shift abnormally to inaccessible regions and could not be deleted in certain situations. If you are experiencing this issue, the abnormal markers on your map will disappear after this update.
- Fixed the issue where, after unlocking all Resonance Beacons in the Central Plains, the Resonance Beacon category still did not show 100% Exploration Progress.
- Fixed the issue where, in certain situations, using Waypoint at random locations on the map would prompt ""Unable to use in the current status of this region,"" preventing Fast Travel.
- Fixed the issue where, when exchanging Astrites for Waveplates, if Astrites were insufficient and Lunites were used to obtain Astrites, Waveplates could still not be exchanged.
- Fixed the issue where defeating certain enemies did not count toward the ""Defeat 15 enemies in total"" quest in Activity Points.
- Fixed the issue where, in the Data Bank > Data Merge screen, when selecting merge materials, holding an Echo did not display the checkbox.
- Fixed the issue where the Chat screen would become unresponsive in Co-op Mode.
- Fixed the issue where Player 2 could not see Player 1's Resonator model correctly in Co-op Mode.
- Fixed the issue where, in certain situations, remapped keys could be reset to default configurations after restarting the game.
- Fixed the issue where, when using a controller, the sound effect would trigger abnormally after the Resonator's Concerto Energy was full.
- Fixed the issue where certain voicelines in Resonator profiles did not align correctly with certain language settings.
- Fixed the issue on Android devices where pictures taken with the Camera and Save functions did not save properly to the local album.
**Challenges, Puzzles, and Events**
- Fixed the issue in the Depths of Illusive Realm event where, after Jinhsi activated the Coruscation skill in the Character Upgrade, the generated Stagnant Zone duration of Loong's Reign did not match the skill description.
- Fixed the issue where certain scene models appeared abnormal in the Depths of Illusive Realm event on mobile devices.
- Fixed the issue in Echo Challenge: Clang Bang where, after completing the challenge, you could still interact with the device and reactivate the challenge.
- Fixed the issue in Tactical Hologram: Calamity where the Resonator's model would display abnormally in a specific area near the hologram.
- Fixed the issue where, after the start of Tactical Hologram: Ski, interacting with the Grapple would prevent the ski state from being correctly activated.
- Fixed the issue with a specific Vine Trap and Explosive Charge puzzle (Explosive Charge coordinates: 954,2935,55) in the Whining Aix's Mire > Court of Savantae Ruins region, where the Vine Trap would not fully burn out after using the Explosive Charge, preventing puzzle completion. If you are experiencing this issue, please revisit the location and use the Explosive Charge again to fully burn out the remaining Vine Trap after this update.
- Fixed the issue in Desorock Highland: Tacet Field I and Desorock Highland: Tacet Field II where the description of the Attribute DMG increase in Tacet Field on the Map screen did not match the actual increase in Attribute DMG.
**Quests**
- Fixed the issue where, in certain situations, the instructions for transforming into Clang Bang would not disappear correctly during the Truthseeker's Pass quest during Main Quest: Thaw of Eons.
- Fixed the issue where transforming into an Exile would cause abnormal movement into deep water areas during Side Quest: Secret Investigation.
- Fixed the issue where objects would float abnormally in certain scenes during Side Quest: Lores Beyond the Ranges.
- Fixed the issue where, in certain situations, Activity Points were not correctly awarded after completing Daily Quests.
- Fixed the issue where some dialogues were displayed incorrectly during Companion Story: Immortal Blaze when using the Korean language setting.
**Environment**
- Fixed the issue where you could move abnormally inside buildings at specific locations in the Central Plains.
- Fixed the issue where you could fall abnormally underground at specific locations in Jinzhou.
- Fixed the issue where the water surface would display incorrectly in specific areas of Mt. Firmament on certain mobile devices.
- Fixed the known visual issues with some environment models."

entry.title: Wuthering Waves Fan Creation Event “In the Turquoise Moonglow” is now live!
entry.content:
Dear Rovers,
Wuthering Waves Fan Creation Event "In the Turquoise Moonglow" is now live! Post your work with hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuWaFanart on X (Twitter)/Instagram/Facebook and fill out the form for a chance to win iPhone 15 Pro 512GB, Astrites and more!
Create your works of boundless imagination to present the world of Wuthering Waves!
Proceed to submit: https://forms.gle/G2NzVQzHcHNnwAKh6
**Content Requirement**
Create your own artwork about Wuthering Waves Version 1.2 "In the Turquoise Moonglow"!
Whether it's an illustration of your beloved character, comical moments from your adventures, or difficult combos you've mastered—anything that aligns with the theme is eligible for submission. Share your artwork or video for a chance to win exciting prizes!
**How to Submit**
1. Post your artwork on X (Twitter)/Instagram/Facebook with both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuWaFanart included.
2. Complete the submission form with your submission details. Once done, your submission will be considered successful.
\*Please quote your post link with the right hashtags published publicly on the designated platforms.
Submission form: https://forms.gle/G2NzVQzHcHNnwAKh6
**Submission Period**
2024/08/15 - 2024/09/15 (PT)
**Rewards**
1st Place (5 Winners): iPhone 15 Pro 512GB
2nd Place (5 Winners): 6,000 Astrites & 800 USD
3rd Place (10 Winners): 3,000 Astrites & 400 USD
4th Place (15 Winners): 2,000 Astrites & 200 USD
5th Place (20 Winners): 1,000 Astrites & Official Merchandise
**Judging Criteria**
All eligible works will undergo evaluation based on their adherence to the theme, degree of completion, reception among players, and other relevant factors.
**Notes**
1. To qualify for participation, you should include both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuWaFanart in your post and fill out the submission form.
2. Deleted posts will not be qualified for entitlement of rewards.
3. You can submit multiple entries and win multiple rewards. However, the same work published on different platforms will not count towards the rewards.
4. Entries listed below may be excluded from the judging process:
\*Works not created in accordance with Wuthering Waves
\*Works found to contain plagiarism or infringement of intellectual property rights
\*Works submitted outside the event period
\*Works created with the assistance of AI technology
\*Works featuring extremely aggressive content, including but not limited to themes of pornography, violence, politics, or racism
\*Works that have already been used for commercial purposes
\*Works previously entered into other fan creation events
\*Works deemed inappropriate by the judges
5. Failure to reply to the official staff within 7 days from the date of notification will be considered a waiver of entitlement to the rewards.
6. This event is open to submissions from all languages, as creators proficient in any language are eligible to compete for rewards. Entries differing only in language will be treated as equivalent works.

entry.content:
Dear Rovers,
The Wuthering Waves Battle Rush is now live! Record and share your most exciting battle moments with the hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle on X (Twitter)/YouTube Shorts/TikTok to compete for a reward of Astrite x2,000 and a chance to get featured on our social media with direct credits! Other than these rewards, 10 extra winners will be selected to receive a $50 Amazon Gift Card.
Showcase your outstanding battle tactics in a condensed clip and share them with us!
**Content Requirement**
Create your own combat video featuring Wuthering Waves.
We require no limits to the characters, level, or scenes. All entries that feature your combat in Wuthering Waves are qualified to join the event and compete for rewards!
**How to Submit**
Post your work on X (Twitter)/YouTube Shorts/TikTok with both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle included publicly.
**Submission Period**
2024/08/23 - 2024/09/25 08:00 (PT)
**Judging Criteria**
All eligible works will undergo evaluation based on their adherence to the theme, degree of completion, reception among players, and other relevant factors.
**Notes**
To qualify for participation, you should include both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle in your post.
Deleted posts will not be qualified for entitlement of rewards.
You can submit multiple entries. However, the same work published on different platforms will not count towards the rewards.
Entries listed below may be excluded from the judging process:
\*Works not created in accordance with Wuthering Waves
\*Works found to contain plagiarism or infringement of intellectual property rights
\*Works submitted outside the event period
\*Works created with the assistance of AI technology
\*Works featuring extremely aggressive content, including but not limited to themes of pornography, violence, politics, or racism
\*Works that have already been used for commercial purposes
\*Works deemed inappropriate by the judges
Failure to reply to the official staff within 7 days from the date of notification will be considered a waiver of entitlement to the rewards.
This event is open to submissions from all languages, as creators proficient in any language are eligible to compete for rewards. Entries differing only in language will be treated as equivalent works.

entry.title: Wuthering Waves Developer's Message: The Black Shores Preview
entry.content:
Dear Rovers,
First, we want to express our heartfelt thanks for all your support and love for Wuthering Waves. It's crazy how time flies—we are already halfway through Version 1.2 "In the Turquoise Moonglow". We hope the Moonlit Fair has been a blast for you so far.
While you are enjoying all the festivities, new stories are unfolding beyond the borders of Jinzhou. We have some awesome updates in the pipeline and we are excited to give you a sneak peek through this preview.
In this preview, you can have a glimpse into the new area, gameplay features, and some storylines currently in development.
**✦New Area✦**
**New Area: The Black Shores**
The Black Shores, an archipelago enshrouded in mysteries and turmoil, remains sealed away from the world in thick digital fog. It is still uncertain when or who will lift its veil, allowing it to once more shoulder the task of connecting the world.
**✦New Character✦**
**New Resonator: Youhu**
We've cooked up something special with our upcoming Resonator Youhu. Her Resonance Skill and Resonance Liberation come with new QTE mechanics that bring a twist to combat. It's fun, it's unique, and we think you're going to love it.
**✦New Gameplay Content✦**
**New "Portal" Puzzles**
We are adding "Portals" to some puzzle-solving scenarios so you can hop between different areas, or even... No more spoilers, we can't wait to see how you use them!
**New Special Enemy: Hedgepuff**
Complete the new collection quests in the Black Shores to unlock this little guy and other special enemies. Keep an eye out for them—they are scattered across the shores, waiting for Rovers brave enough to test their skills.
**New Boss: Fallacy of No Return**
A ██████ created by the Tethys System, patrolling the borders between reality and digital world.
**New Tactical Hologram: Inferno Rider**
We are also expanding the Tactical Hologram with some exciting new challenges. Even more exciting and challenging battle content will be coming your way in future updates. Be ready!
**✦New Stories✦**
**New Companion Story: Small Wooly, Big Adventures**
Every story is an extension of life, and adventure is the beginning of a story. Encore extends a special invitation to you—the adventure is about to begin! As her closest friend, will you join the Wooly Warrior on this exciting journey?
Note: All content shared in the preview is still in development and may not represent the final quality. For accurate details, please refer to the official release notice when the content goes live.
---
There is still so much more on the horizon, and we will continue to share new content and optimization details with you, so stay tuned!
And don't forget, as we sent out this message, the Moon-Chasing Festival featured event "By Moon's Grace" is still in full swing in Jinzhou. Participate to claim Astrite and material rewards, and raise Popularity for the upcoming "Converging Paths" event. You won't want to miss the chance to get the free 5-Star Resonator Xiangli Yao!

entry.title: V1.2 WUWA Discord Quest Livestream Event Begins!
entry.content:
Dear Rover,
V1.2 WUWA Discord Quest Livestream Event has begun. Click the link below to complete the streaming quest on Discord and get a chance to win rewards including Morphable Echo!
[https://discord.com/quests/1278785843187679324](<https://discord.com/quests/1278785843187679324>)
### ✦Event Duration✦
Now - September 9th (4:59PM PDT)
###
### ✦Rewards✦
Shell Credit ×15,000
Advanced Resonance Potion ×2
Advanced Energy Core ×2
Morphable Echo ×1
Please note that the rewards are limited to 300,000 in total and will be given out on a first-come, first-served basis, determined by the time the Redemption Code is claimed after completing the streaming quest. The Redemption Code will expire at 09:00 AM (PDT) on October 09.
### ✦Who is Eligible✦
Available to players on PC where both Discord and Wuthering Waves are available.
Discord’s premium services are restricted in some regions.
### ✦Other Terms✦
Limit of one reward redemption per account.
For more information on Discord Quests, please visit [Discord Quest Help Center](<https://support.discord.com/hc/articles/22225719947543>).
### ✦How to Participate✦
In order to successfully complete the V1.2 WUWA Discord Quest, players who meet the eligibility criteria must live stream their Wuthering Waves gameplay to a friend via a Discord voice channel for a minimum duration of 15 minutes on the desktop app.
1. Before you can begin the Quest, launch the game.
2. Then, head to your Discord desktop app and navigate to a direct message (DM), group chat, or a server of your choice.
3. Once there, start a voice call or join a voice channel and select the Screen Share icon located in the voice status panel. Be sure to select the individual application for the game before you Go Live.
\*NOTE: You must select the game application to stream! Streaming your device’s screen will not progress your Quest forward. Once you stream, you can check the progress bar on the Quest Home to ensure progress is being made on the Quest.
4. When you’re ready to stream your gameplay, press Go Live. You can learn more about streaming your game [here](<https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/360040816151-Go-Live-and-Screen-Share#h_01HFFJ28PJAY9AHGRQ85XRSF8G>).
###
### ✦Redemption Instructions✦
1. Once you have completed the Quest by streaming 15 minutes of Wuthering Waves, you will receive a reward code in Quest Home (Discovery > Quests). For detailed instructions on how to claim your reward code, please refer to [Discord Quests FAQ.](<https://support.discord.com/hc/articles/22225719947543-Discord-Quests-FAQ#h_01HVPBZR5FKKSQ3R1JXB9E4DM3>)
2. Select your server and enter Wuthering Waves, and then go to [Settings] - [Other] - [Redemption Code].
3. Enter the [Redemption Code] and hit [Confirm] to redeem rewards. You can then claim them in your in-game mail.
4. The [Redemption Code] function will be unlocked once you've reached Union Level 2.
5. The Redemption Code obtained in this event will expire on 2024/10/09 at 09:00 (PDT). Redemption Codes that expire will be unable to be redeemed.
### ✦Discord Quest FAQ✦
**Q: Is there a limit on how many Quests I can redeem on my Discord account?**
A: Eligible users can redeem one of each of the available Quest campaigns on their Discord account.
For more information on Discord Quests, visit [Discord Quest Help Center](<https://support.discord.com/hc/articles/22225719947543>).
**Q: Is this feature/promotion available in my region?**
A: Some Quests will not be available in all regions based on terms and conditions. If you are in an ineligible region for a Quest, you will not be able to complete it.
Additionally, Discord’s premium services are restricted in some regions. If you are unable to access the Gift Inventory, you are not eligible for Quests.
**Q: I have concerns or questions regarding privacy and Quests.**
A: We encourage you to review [Discord’s Privacy Policy](<https://discord.com/privacy>) for further details about how we use your information. You can head over to [Data Used for In-Game Rewards](<https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/22225542459415>) article, to learn more about how we use data for Quests.
**Q: Why am I unable to complete Quest while using Linux?**
A: Currently, Quest rewards are unable to be earned on Linux devices.
However, Discord team is looking into a resolution for this issue so that earning Quest rewards is possible on Linux in the future. For now, we recommend completing the requirement on a different operating system, like Windows or MacOS.
Discord support team does not have an exact ETA for when a solution will be available, and won't be able to provide any status updates on this specific issue.
**Q: I no longer see a Quest. Where did it go?**
A: Quests are typically only available for a limited amount of time. If you no longer see a Quest in the Quest Home or in-app notifications about the quest, the period to complete and claim the reward for the Quest is over.

※ The pre-download material is approximately 30GB in size. Make sure that you have enough storage space on your PC.
2. Default use of DirectX 12 to launch the game (NVIDIA GeForce RTX 20 Series and above, Intel graphics cards)
① With DirectX 12, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 40 Series graphics cards will support DLSS 3 super resolution and NVIDIA Reflex, while XeSS upscaling will be enabled for Intel graphics cards. This update will also improve compatibility across a wide range of GPUs, resolving issues such as black screens or visual distortions caused by certain hardware.
② After the update, shaders will need to be recompiled the first time you launch the game with DirectX 12. This process may cause some initial stuttering or frame rate drops, but performance will return to normal once it's complete.
※ If shader compilation causes extended stuttering or disrupts gameplay, you can exit the game and select Launch with DirectX 11 below the Start button, or contact customer service for assistance.
**[Device Requirements]**
To ensure a smooth experience, please refer to the following requirements:
① Minimum
Android: [System] Android 7.0 or later; [Processor] Snapdragon 835, MediaTek G71/72 or processors of better/equivalent performance; [RAM] 4 GB or more
iOS: [System] iOS 14 or later; [Model] iPhone 11 or newer, iPad with A13 Bionic or processors of better/equivalent performance; [RAM] 4 GB or more
PC: [System] Windows 10 64-bit; [CPU] Intel I5 (9th Gen)/Ryzen 2700; [GPU] Geforce 1060/RX570/Intel ARC A380, [RAM] 16 GB or more
② Recommended
Android: [System] Android 7.0 or later; [Processor] Snapdragon Gen1+/Gen2/Gen3 or MediaTek processors of better/equivalent performance; [RAM] 6 GB or more
iOS: [System] iOS 15 or later; [Model] iPhone 13 or newer, iPad with A15 Bionic or processors of better/equivalent performance; [RAM] 6 GB or more
PC: [System] Windows 10 64-bit; [CPU] Intel I7 (9th Gen)/Ryzen 3700, [GPU] Geforce 2060/RX5700XT/Intel ARC A750; [RAM] 16 GB or more
③ Required Storage Space
Android/iOS: 16 GB
PC: 30 GB; it's recommended to install the game on an SSD.
④ Controller Support
Wuthering Waves currently supports the following controllers on Mobile.
Wireless Controllers: Xbox series, Xbox Elite series, DualShock®4, DualSense®, DualSense Edge™
Wuthering Waves currently supports the following controllers on PC.
Wired/Wireless Controllers: Xbox series, Xbox Elite series
Wireless Controllers: DualSense®, DualSense Edge™
Wired Controllers: DualShock®4

entry.title: Version 1.3 [The Black Shores] Special Leveling Events
entry.content:
Dear Rovers,
Thank you for your continued support and enthusiasm for Wuthering Waves!
With version 1.2 "In the Turquoise Moonglow" drawing to a close, how have you been faring with the "Converging Paths" event? Did you enjoy the Moonlit Fair?
Since the "Converging Paths" event's release, we have received your complaints about the sudden increase in resource requirements after unlocking Resonator Xiangli Yao and its added strain. To help ease your burden, we've decided to roll out a batch of special leveling events in Version 1.3 in addition to the content we originally planned:
**Version 1.3 Special Leveling Events Explained**
Alongside the events already announced, we'll add three leveling events—two brand-new and one rerun. Participate in these events to get a wealth of Shell Credit and various development materials. Don't miss out if you are at Union Level 14 or above!
**NEW [Parade of Stars] Special Leveling Event**
✦About: This event will feature 4 different types of tasks: Resonator Leveling, Weapon Leveling, Echo Leveling, and Skill Leveling. Complete these tasks to receive various rewards.
✦Duration: Version 1.3 update - 2024-11-13 15:59 (server time)
✦Rewards: Shell Credit x710,000, Premium Tuner x100, Premium Sealed Tube x50, Premium Resonance Potion x50, Premium Energy Core x34, Forgery Premium Supply x25, Premium Enclosure Tank x28, and other development materials.
※"Forgery Premium Supply" allows you to select from: Heterized Metallic Drip, Flawless Phlogiston, Presto Helix, Waveworn Residue 239, and Cadence Blossom. "Premium Enclosure Tank" allows you to select from: Tailored Ring, FF Whisperin Core, and FF Howler Core.
**NEW [Wuthering Exploration] Featured Exploration Event**
✦About: Complete Survey Tasks daily to get Survey Points and claim rewards after meeting Survey Point requirements.
✦Duration: 2024-10-10 10:00 - 2024-10-24 03:59 (server time)
✦Rewards: Shell Credit x2,000,000, Tailored Ring x30, FF Whisperin Core x30, FF Howler Core x30.
**RERUN [Wuthering Exploration] Featured Exploration Event: Mt. Firmament**
✦About: Complete Survey Tasks daily to get Survey Points and claim rewards after meeting Survey Point requirements.
✦Duration: 2024-10-31 10:00 - 2024-11-13 03:59 (server time)
✦Rewards: Astrite x800, Malleable Elite Class Echo I x1, Malleable Elite Class Echo II x1, Premium Tuner x100, Premium Sealed Tube x30.
In the upcoming Version 1.3 [To the Shore's End], in addition to implementing the optimizations mentioned in the Version 1.3 Black Shores Broadcast, such as "Collection Spots Tracking" and "Batch Merge," we are also expanding the selection of development materials in the Store's Oscillated Coral section. Be sure to check them out after the update goes live!
We have also taken note of your other suggestions, such as "Echo info display upon absorption," "auto-select options for Echo upgrade," "portable synthesizer," and "Echo presets." These improvements are already in the works and will be rolled out in future updates. Please stay tuned!
**※ Details mentioned above are subject to change. For the latest updates, please refer to the official announcements.**

entry.title: Version 1.3: To the Shore's End Patch Notes
entry.content:
Dear Rover,
Thank you for your continued support. We are excited to announce that Version 1.3: To the Shore's End will become available soon!
[Maintenance Time & Compensation Details]
✦Maintenance Time: 2024-09-29 04:00 to 2024-09-29 11:00 (UTC+8)
✦Maintenance Compensation: Astrite x300, Crystal Solvent x2

✦Bug Fixes Compensation: Astrite x300
✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2024-09-29 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the Version 1.4 update.
※Please note that the compensation will be sent via in-game mail within 6 hours after the maintenance is completed and the server is back online. The mail will remain valid for 30 days.
[Version Update Details]
✦New Resonators✦
5-Star Resonator: Shorekeeper (Spectro)
The Shorekeeper, guardian of the Black Shores—this title alone once defined her.
But desires, bonds, and emotions… She only began to understand these things after meeting you.
✦Combat Roles: Support and Healer, Traction, DMG Amplification
※Obtainable through the [Till the Sea Turns Clear] Featured Resonator Convene.
4-Star Resonator: Youhu (Glacio)
A voluble and whimsical antique appraiser.
Known for creating limericks on the spot, she presents her appraisals with flair and precision. She sets up a stall on the street, ensuring antiques find their way to those who truly cherish them.
✦Combat Roles: Support and Healer, Resonance Skill DMG, Vibration Strength Reduction, Coordinated Attack DMG Amplification
※Obtainable through the [Prevail the Lasting Night] Featured Resonator Convene. Starting from Version 1.4, 4-Star Resonator Youhu will be permanently available in Standard Weapon & Character Convene.
✦New Weapons✦
5-Star Weapon: Stellar Symphony (Rectifier)
A rectifier bearing an energy core that simulates the lifecycle of stars—an infinite loop that originates from a singularity and ends in explosive demise. The celestial debris collides in thunderous rumbles, heralding the birth of a new star.
※Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation - Stellar Symphony] Featured Weapon Convene.
4-Star Weapon Series: Deep Sky Blazar—Waning Redshift (Broadblade), Endless Collapse (Sword), Relativistic Jet (Pistols), Celestial Spiral (Gauntlets), Fusion Accretion (Rectifier)

Fallacy of No Return (Overlord Class)
The last line of defense built by the Tethys System, patrolling the borders between reality and digital world.
✦New Stories✦
Main Quest: To the Shore's End (Chapter I Act VIII)
The Black Shores, an archipelago enshrouded in mysteries and turmoil, remains sealed away from the world in thick digital fog. It remains uncertain when or who will lift its veil, allowing it to once more shoulder the task of connecting the world.
✦Duration: Permanently available after the Version 1.3 update.
✦Prerequisite: Complete Main Quest: Thaw of Eons (Chapter I Act VII).

entry.title: Developer's Message
entry.content:
Dear Rovers,
Since the start of Version 1.1 CBT, our work has been overshadowed by unauthorized content leaks. These leaks have spread fast and wide, including story cutscenes, storyboard drafts, character concept art, and even discarded environment assets. Many of you have expressed frustration at encountering leaked content despite your efforts to avoid it, largely due to platform algorithms. These unverified leaks have dulled the impact of our official version updates and caused major spoilers, undermining the experience we've carefully crafted for you.
Last month, we issued a statement condemning leaks and received widespread support from our community. Thanks to this, many leakers realized the harm they were causing and ceased their activities. Unfortunately, with the launch of the Version 1.4 CBT server, we are once again facing severe leaks of unreleased content.
Developing a new version is meticulous and time-consuming. Character creation, for example, begins several versions ahead with user research, followed by months of design, development, testing, and fine-tuning. Before each update, we conduct a closed beta test to ensure the final product meets player expectations. Promotion only begins when everything is ready, with methodically scheduled moments to provide the best experience. We believe this approach ensures consistent, polished releases, allowing players and content creators to fully engage with each update. Unfortunately, leaks disrupt this process, taking away the element of surprise and undermining the hard work of our team members who put their hearts into every detail.
In response to the damage caused by these leaks, we have implemented stronger measures to prevent future incidents. These measures include reinforcing confidentiality in our test servers, issuing formal warnings, and collaborating with various content-sharing platforms to remove unauthorized material. Additionally, we have initiated legal proceedings against severe breaches of intellectual property, which are currently progressing through the courts. We are committed to defending our work against unauthorized distribution and are prepared to take further legal actions as needed.
Now, with Version 1.4 CBT on track and preparations for official marketing well underway, the team is focused on developing our next major update—a brand-new area that we've been designing based on all the feedback from you since launch. This new area is a true co-creation between us and the player community; in a way, it belongs to all of us. We call on all players to cherish this creative journey together. Please help us protect our hard work by standing against leaks. We will continue gathering evidence against those who steal and distribute our unreleased materials. If you encounter any leaks, we encourage you to report them to us via our dedicated email: [legal@kurogames.com](<mailto:legal@kurogames.com>).
Once again, we extend our deepest thanks to all of you for your love and support.
Wuthering Waves Dev Team
October 21, 2024

entry.title: Wuthering Waves Developer's Message
entry.content:
Dear Rovers, Thank you for your continued support for Wuthering Waves. With Version 1.4: When the Night Knocks just around the corner, it's time for another installment of Wuthering Waves Developer's Message. In this update, we're adding new gameplay elements, an exciting new feature, and optimizations to enhance your experience.
**✦New Gameplay Elements✦**
**New Combat Mechanism: Dream Link** Dream Link is a new combat mechanism that will be introduced in the Main Event of Version 1.4. Dream Link enhances the synergy between your Resonators, allowing them to unlock their true potential together. When certain conditions align during combat, Dream Link will activate, dramatically amplifying your team’s combat prowess.
**Overdrive Combat: Illusive Sprint** In the Main Event of Version 1.4, you can pick up the white cat's blessings to enter the Illusive Sprint state that increases your moving speed. Lumi, a Resonator who will make her debut in the new version, has a similar ability. When certain requirements are met, instead of dodging, Lumi dashes to get out of harm's way and is capable of attacking enemies while moving at high speed.
These two new gameplay mechanisms will be available in the Main Event of Version 1.4. Once the Main Event concludes, it will be added as a Permanent Event, where the same gameplay mechanisms will still be available.
**✦New Feature✦** **Weapon Cosmetics: Weapon Projection** With Version 1.4, we’re introducing an exciting new customization feature: Weapon Projections. This feature lets you transform the appearance of your weapons without affecting their stats, allowing you to create a look that’s entirely your own. ※ Participate in the Main Event of Version 1.4 to obtain a free Weapon Projection associated with the event featured 4-Star Sword. Additionally, we are adding Transparent Weapon Projections, available for all five weapon types. You can use a Transparent Weapon Projection to turn the equipped weapon completely or partially invisible. We hope these new options let you add even more personality to your Resonators’ looks, whether you're exploring or capturing moments in photos. ※ Participate in Version 1.4's Depths of Illusive Realm to obtain a complete set of Transparent Weapon Projections for free. ※ Equip a Transparent Weapon Projection to make Rectifiers and Gauntlets completely invisible, or turn Swords, Broadblades, or Pistols partially transparent.
**✦Gaming Experience Optimizations✦**
**Leveling-related Optimizations: Double Rewards, Step-by-Step Echo Upgrade** To enhance your long-term gaming experience, Version 1.4 will introduce a series of leveling-related optimizations as part of an ongoing project. In this update, you’ll be able to Fast Travel directly to the location of any Tacet Suppression or Boss challenge via the Map. Additionally, you’ll have the option to spend double the Waveplates to earn double rewards upon completing a Forgery, Simulation, or Tacet Suppression challenge. We've also improved the display of Results Screens, giving you a clearer view of the rewards you've earned.
Last but not least, in Version 1.4, you can conveniently upgrade an Echo to the exact levels that unlock new substats (5/10/15/20/25) through the Auto-Select Settings. We hope this change can improve your Echo Upgrade experience and efficiency.
**Interface-related Optimizations: Waveplate Info Pop-up, Echo Info Pop-up, Tower of Adversity Interface Adjustments** Starting from Version 1.4, whenever you log into the game, you'll receive a pop-up displaying the amount of Waveplates and Waveplate Crystals you own. The displayed information for a newly absorbed Echo will also be optimized. Upon absorption, the Echo's Sonata Effect category will be displayed along with its Mainstat and Substat. In the current version, adjusting your team lineup in the Tower of Adversity requires leaving and re-entering, which we know can interrupt your gameplay experience. To improve this, we've optimized the interface in the upcoming version, allowing you to view and adjust your team directly within the Tower. Apart from the above, more optimizations are in the pipeline, along with more gameplay elements and features. Please stay tuned!
**※ All content shared in the preview is still in development and may not represent the final quality. For accurate details, please refer to the official release notice when the content goes live.**

entry.title: Wuthering Waves Update Preview | Version 1.4 "When the Night Knocks" to be released on Nov 14th
Developer's Notes - Resonators of First Encounter
entry.content:
Many ideas and interpretations came across our minds when designing the characters within the world of Wuthering Waves. Rovers must also be eager to learn more about the trio of Resonators who they would initially meet at the very start of their journey. So, we hope to share our notes, to help Rovers understand more about them.
**Yangyang**
**1.1 Like wind flowing at your side**
The first character for the Rover to know in the world of Wuthering Waves, Yangyang will be the starting member on your team as you set on the journey. She plays key parts in upcoming stories, as well. Utmost gentleness is going to be the impression of Yangyang in her long companionship going forward.
Even in this land of pain and destruction, there are still ones keeping their maximal kindness "naively", of whom Yangyang is an embodiment. She endeavors to find the perfect solution out of the impossible; She dedicates herself to the defense of all the goodness, even sometimes at the cost of herself. Being gentle never means ever-surrendering tolerance; on the contrary, it brings great power. That warrants a natural depth and a contradiction to Yangyang's personality: she must be tough and even obstinate to be a practicer of kindness. Of course, this comes at an expense. On the journey, Yangyang might face crises and loss due to her character.
**1.2 The Skylark that praises beauty**
The images of Wind and Feather. They leave the impression of light and soft. Under some conditions, however, they may show unexpected strength. These two images come close to Yangyang's way of being gentle: a soothing, innocent girl in ordinary times, but a warrior like howling winds during fights. This extends our imagination and reminds us of Percy Shelley's To a Skylark: "Languor cannot be ... Thou lovest, but ne'er knew love's sad satiety".
Skylark is not a peculiar kind of bird like Fenghuang or eagle, but it is an idealization, a praise for beauty and happiness. May Yangyang bring solace to you just like a skylark, in this world of surging tides of sounds.
**1.3 Gentleness: Key to Yangyang's Image**
Gentleness might be one of the classic tags of a character that is most common but most difficult to define, especially for Yangyang, as she is not "weak" in the way people would generally tell of a gentle character. With that in mind, when Yangyang was being put into shape, we hoped she could shine more different lights to catch your attention, except from the above-mentioned images of skylark and feather. For example, a sense of first love. Yangyang's general impression is warming, just like your childhood sweetheart, who has been here so long, that you will always recall the first sight of her, no matter how far you have gone, or how many faces you have met. Another role she plays is a listener who senses the breezes. Yangyang is not someone of strong mood swings; instead, she listens quietly, and feels closely. She connects to the wind, in her way. Hence, a girl soothing like the wind and yet strong in her senses, came to Rover's side.
---
**Chixia**
**2.1 Chixia Is Gonna Light Up Your World!**
In an overall depressing world, there is a passionate and candid companion, unfearful of letting her emotions be heard, accompanying Rover carrying out more and more exciting adventures going forward. By featuring eye-catching bright red colors in her appearance, along with a backward-tied sprout, all of which manifests the passionate and high-spirited characteristics of Chixia.
Chixia's outfit bears a rather bold style similar to collage and cut-out arts. During battles, parts of her outfit flutters with the wind as she performs actions, further highlighting the superb pistol-wielding skills of Tiancheng's favorite hero.
Chixia features various distinctive personal traits, such as fondness towards spices, and cherishing of the macram bracelets she wears from her home, etc. These reflect her status of being a migrant to Tiancheng, which in turn draws out a detailed and complete worldview of Huanglong.
**2.2 Chixia? Or Ma Xiaofang?**
Throughout the history of Huanglong, many migrants from various regions of the nation moved to Tiancheng. The Ma family was one of the many. As Xiaofang pursues her hero dream, she always wanted a renowned nickname of her own, just like those from the plays, to boost confidence when in need. Hence the nickname "Chixia", Blazing Dawn. But of course, besides these "glorified excuses", the real reason behind the nickname contains notions of Xiaofang's own personal motives. Which is something that is left for Rover to discover.
**2.3 Chixia's Hero Dream**
Having witnessed her own courageous father fighting for his nation, the regular visit to hero-themed plays during her childhood, and even the valiant atmosphere among the Tiancheng population resisting the Wuthering Waves, all played a part in the illumination of Chixia's passion for heroism. A hero can be many forms, whether it be a distinguished warrior possessing the might to turn the tides of battle, or an unsung servant who gives in silence yet asks for nothing in return. For Chixia, the word "hero" means someone who can face their fears head on, someone that's able to safeguard those in need during critical times. No matter family, friends, or any other person requiring assistance, Chixia is always the first to step forward. By exploring a variety of directions, Chixia ultimately chose to pursue this path in mind. She is a vibrant figure for the entire Tiancheng to view.
---
**Bailian**
**3.1 A Cold Archaeologist**
As one of the three companions Rover would meet early on in the journey, Bailian is a rather cold and reserved person when compared to the gentleness of Yangyang and the enthusiastic Chixia. Not only a "Cold Beauty" who distances herself from others, as an archaeologist of the Huanglong Academy, Bailian's personality also bears the rationality that of a scientist.
Thus, due to having extreme rationale, Bailian features some peculiar traits. One of which is showing meticulous attention to details, not being able to stand descriptions such as "a touch of oil" within cooking recipes, and instead she will precisely measure the amount of ingredients needed using a proper scale...
**3.2 The Birth of You'tan**
You'tan is a Remnant symbiotically connected with Bailian. It obeys Bailian's commands, and is able to reflect her physical condition to a certain degree. Bailian was once left in a life-threatening situation, one which downright demolished her trust of other human beings, leading to You'tan's birth in the process. In Bailian's own words, You'tan is "a copy of myself". Rather to have trust in others, Bailian is more willing to trust You'tan. You'tan also seems to possess powers of inversion, embodying Bailian's kindness and will within itself.
**3.3 Diving Into Bailian and You'tan's Appearances**
Similar to her name "Bailian", White Lotus, Bailian's appearance shows hints of her cold personality. Her clothing style features simple yet elegant black & white coloring. On the other hand, Bailian is a lady of action who would more than often explore archaeological sites personally. Therefore, her outfit is rather close-fitting and function orientated, at the same time not lacking in Huanglong characteristics in its detailing.
You'tan presents an airy and streamlined overall appearance, showing matching elegance to that of Bailian. The many mysterious petal-like patterns that surround its body can also be seen as an echo to its master's name.
The entirety of You'tan‘s tail section is hollow, which extends a sound spectrum acting as the connection with Bailian. You'tan's personalities can also be examined during combats and interactions with Bailian.
---
Three Resonators, three distinct personalities. Even more mysteries around them await Rovers. Encounter and discover them in person. Subsequently, we will continue to unravel the world for Rovers to perceive.

The compensation can be claimed before the next version update. - Fixed an issue where the duration of the special effects for Resonator Shorekeeper's Resonance Liberation "End Loop" sometimes failed to match that of the Skill's actual effects. - Fixed an issue where the Terminal on the Resonators - Echo page for Resonator Shorekeeper sometimes appeared defective. - Fixed an issue where certain types of attacks from Resonator Xiangli Yao and Resonator Yangyang sometimes failed to trigger the effects of the Stellarealm that appears after Resonator Shorekeeper casts her Resonance Liberation. - Fixed an issue where the effects of Resonator Changli's True Sight: Conquest would sometimes become defective. - Fixed an issue where the animation for Resonator Changli's Resonance Liberation sometimes appeared defective. - Fixed an issue where certain movements of Resonator Jinhsi's in the Incarnation state appeared defective. - Fixed an issue where the effects of Resonator Jiyan's Inherent Skill "Tempest Taming" could not be triggered by certain Echo Skills. - Fixed an issue where the Healing effect from Remnant Entities would sometimes be applied multiple times after Resonator Baizhi cast her Resonance Liberation. - Fixed an issue where, after the Fast Travel option was used, the special effects for a Resonator's skills would sometimes fail to appear, or the effects of these skills would become defective. - Fixed an issue where the visuals sometimes appeared defective when a Resonator started moving around after a combat challenge ended.
**Enemies & Echoes** - Fixed an issue where enemies on the second floor of the Echoing Tower in the Tower of Adversity's Overdrive Zone would sometimes remain on the scene after their defeat. - Fixed an issue where, in the "Tactical Hologram: Calamity" - "Tempest Mephis" challenge, the enemy's Vibration Strength sometimes failed to recover after it came out of its Immobilized state. - Fixed an issue where a Resonator was sometimes unable to exit the transformation after transforming into Thundering Mephis.
**Features** - Fixed an issue where at SOL3 Phase 8, the Shell Credit rewards shown on the Guidebook - Recurring Challenges - Forgery Challenge page differed from the amount of Shell Credit actually received after completing the challenge. - Fixed an issue where certain Echoes would be miscategorized on the Guidebook - Echo Hunting page when the Filter function was used. - Fixed an issue where Resonators sometimes moved at abnormal speed after the Utility Wheel was used. - Fixed an issue where, in Co-op Mode, markers indicating the locations of other players sometimes appeared on your Map. - Fixed an issue where the loading progress would sometimes go awry when exiting Co-op Mode, preventing players from exiting. - Fixed an issue where, in Co-op Mode, the "Defeated" pop-up sometimes failed to disappear after a downed Resonator was revived. - Fixed an issue where the "Revive" button sometimes failed to appear after the Resonators were downed. - Fixed an issue where, in Controller Mode, the relevant icon did not appear after "LB + D-pad down" was assigned to "Dodge." - Fixed an issue where, with mobile controllers, the option "Tap 'R' to Lock on Target and Tap 'R' Again to Disable Target Lock" failed to take effect when turned on via Settings > Lock-on Mode. - Fixed an issue where controllers would sometimes vibrate when used to play the game on certain Android devices. - Fixed an issue where it was sometimes impossible to remove the red notification dot from the Chat icon. - Fixed an issue where the screens of some mobile devices would sometimes go black temporarily when bringing up the Settings menu. - Fixed an issue where, in Resonator Showcase, switching to Resonator Verina would sometimes cause the relevant animation to appear defective. - Fixed an issue where the Thaw of Eons image was not in the correct position on the Gallery - Main Story page. - Corrected certain known textual errors.
**Challenges, Puzzles & Events** - Fixed an issue where it was impossible to view the Special Mechanism of a Tacet Field again after opening and closing the relevant page. - Fixed an issue where, with Hoverdroid: Shooter still locked, a random pop-up would appear when a Resonator came near a Hover Target challenge site in the overworld.
**Quests** - Fixed an issue where, during Main Quest: Hidden Between the Waves, certain pillars displayed uncleared corrupted data even after their corrupted data had been cleared. It was a display issue that did not affect the progression of the quest. - Fixed an issue where, in Side Quest: Cerulean Echoes Adrift in the Winds - Part I, the Aetherfin would sometimes stop moving following the conversation with KU-Key. - Fixed an issue where no HP was deducted when a Resonator, after transforming into an Inferno Rider, dashed against obstacles in Exploration Quest: We Promise, We Deliver. - Fixed an issue where specific NPCs in certain areas during Companion Story: Small Wooly, Big Adventures floated in mid-air. - Fixed the issue where the icon above Langsheng's head did not disappear after the conversation with the NPC ended in Daily Quest: Stand-up Master.
**Environment** - Fixed an issue where the Lv. 120 Tacet Discord "Alptop Champion" in the Black Shores - Tethys' Deep area would sometimes become partially submerged in the ground. - Fixed an issue where certain NPCs in the Black Shores - Black Shores Archipelago area floated in mid-air or exhibited abnormal behavior. - Fixed an issue where connecting Portals in the Black Shores area sometimes caused the screen of an iOS device to flick at certain frame rates. - Fixed an issue where specific structures in certain Huanglong - Whining Aix's Mire areas were invisible on iOS devices. - Fixed an issue where certain NPCs in the Huanglong - Jinzhou area moved at abnormal speed. - Fixed an issue where specific NPCs in certain areas exhibited abnormal behavior. - Resolved known instances of objects clipping through each other or floating in mid-air.

2024/11/13 - 2024/12/13 (PT)

3rd Place (10 Winners): 3,000 Astrites & 400 USD

All eligible works will undergo evaluation based on their adherence to the theme, degree of completion, reception among players, and other relevant factors.

entry.title: Closed Beta Test FAQ
entry.content:
Dear Rover,
Thank you for your continuous love and support! Before you proceed to the recruitment survey, you may check on the statement and detailed instructions about the ongoing Closed Beta Test Recruitment.
**Q1: How will this Closed Beta Test proceed?**
A1: This Closed Beta will only be available for limited testers. All data will be deleted after the test. \*Due to the IP limitation and localization progress. This test will only be available for testers in America and Canada districts. We appreciate your understanding.
**Q2: When will the Closed Beta recruitment end?**
A2: The recruitment will be end at 20:00 Apr. 14th, 2023 (PT).
**Q3: Can I change the submitted survey?**
A3: The info you submitted with the survey of the Closed Beta Test **cannot be changed afterward**. Each email can only submit the survey once. Please check through the information in the survey before submitting it.
**Q4: How do I know I get the Closed Beta Test qualifications?**
A4: We will notify you through**email** with the Closed Beta Test qualifications. We will also send out general notice on our official media platforms.
**Q5: If I selected multiple platforms for gaming, how do I know which one I get the qualification for?**
A5: We will send out detailed installing instructions base on your preference choice. If you selected multiple platforms. We will match up for you randomly. Please follow the**detailed****instructions in the email to join the test on relevant platform.**
**Q6: What's the device requirement for this Closed Beta Test?**
A6: To ensure smooth your installations and a pleasant experience, we recommend minimum device config below:
[Android] Android System of 5.1 version and above, snapdragon 855 and above, and with storage of 10GB and above. [iOS] Model of iPhone 11 and above with storage of 10GB and above. [PC] Device references: <System> Windows 7 64-bit <CPU> Intel i5 -7th generation/Ryzen 2700 <Graphic Card> Geforce 1060/RX 580 <RAM> 16GB <Storage Remains> 40G
**Q7: Can I play on another device during Closed Beta Test?**
A7: Each tester can**have only 1 device on both PC and mobile platforms** for the test. Your data will be the same on both platform as well. The device will be bound once you log in to a device during the Closed Beta Test. **You cannot change device of the same platform** during the test. If you change device during the test, your account will be banned till the end of the test duration. Meanwhile, performing system reinstall, upgrades and hardware changes may also result in login failure. Appealing for unbanning is unavailable for this test. All banned account will not be unbanned afterward. For your personal account security, we would like to kindly remind you: Don't engage in any account sharing/trading, and don't trust in any test qualification selling info, so as not to cause unnecessary losses.
**Q8: Can I live-stream, screenshot, record any content during the Closed Beta Test and publish on social media?**
A8: Yes, you can. However do note that all in game content of this**Closed Beta Test**, including art designs, audio, context, and characters, are all still under development, and they don't represent the final quality of the game.
