entry.title: Developer's Notes - Crownless: The Primal's Desire
entry.content:
**The Primal's Desire**
A high rank Tacet Discord which mimics the form and actions that of a knight engaged in a ceaseless crusade. Despite its fabricated appearance, the Crownless knows nothing of a knight's duty, nor does it possess any chivalry.
It attempts to understand and learn the behavior of a human knight in ward of its overlord, yet fails to grasp the true meaning of guardianship the role entails, as the entity only mechanically wields its lance believing that this will make itself into a glorious knight.
In the end, it merely became a sinister ghost of warfare, lingering amidst a prolonged void of struggle, trapped in the infinite cycle of conflict and death. Once the fighting ends, it finds everything meaningless.
Unknowingly, the feathers of the Crownless' wings have been converted into colors of pitch black.
\*Images featured in this article are for illustration purposes only. Actual depiction may vary in-game.
Even the lance that once symbolized honor has undergone erosion and mutation, radiating an unsettling aura.
**The "Knight's" Death Struggle**
The engagement with the knight includes three stages, each featuring distinct styles of attack and levels of danger. Its condition gradually changes while facing a formidable opponent like the Rover.
**1. Attempting**
During the initial stage, the knight can be seen making its entrance wearing a cloak and engaging in melee combat with fists and feet.
While the various move sets are relatively slow, such as long preparation and recovery stances before and after throwing a punch, they provide openings for counterattacks.
Despite this, as seen from the knight's evasive maneuvers, it appears as though it is more in a state of enjoyment, giving the impression to be testing out Rover's capabilities in a provocative way.
Yet the threat remains. Occasionally, the knight crouches, slamming its fist into the ground to emit a wide range of shockwave from the center. Although the move displays an obvious preparatory posture, a slight lapse of concentration may lead to receiving a serious blow due to its wide range of effect.
Facing this first powerful foe after awakening can be a tense experience, requiring time to learn its patterns and perfect the timing of attacks and evasions. However, this stage allows Rovers to quickly regain their combat prowess.
**2. Riled Up**
The Crownless becomes fully riled up after these previous exchanges, having garnered interest in this capable adversary before it. Hence begins the second stage of the engagement.
Compared to the previous stage, the knight will be more vigilant, always ready to strike or evade as though taking up the role of a professional boxer.
Through endless wars and battles, it has forged itself into a proficient master of martial arts.
As a war machine it no longer dawdles in movements, instead employing speed and precision to take down its target.
Its actions become swifter, making attacks difficult to evade, especially with the added combos.
By accumulating energy, the knight can release a devastating blow full of grandeur. However, this ability comes with a long recovery time, providing an ideal opportunity for the Rover to take advantage of.
From this stage, it becomes apparent that the knight has incorporated various combat styles that of a human warrior into its own. Whether it be the stance of a boxer, or multiple forms of melee techniques, all shows the knight's ability to quickly learn and adapt to human behavior.
**3. Fury**
Having been torn by battle, the knight's cloak is now replaced by a pair of large feathered wings. A lance is called out from beneath its feet, as though showing it now has truly entered the role of a knight, ready to carry out a final duel with the Rover.
With this transformation comes a complete change in the knight's fighting style. It shifts from pure melee attacks to menacing lance strikes, and the newly-obtained wings grant it the capability to pounce from the air.
As the Rover faces sweeping lance blows, the initial strike is easily avoidable, but may be battered by the latter two that come in immediate succession. A combo of three sweeping attacks demands more accurate timing in evasion from its receiver.
In addition to the lance, it would also fling sharp feathers at the unsuspecting Rover. A dishonorable move unlike that of a true knight, and rather more of a desperate attempt for victory out of fury.
The knight's assaults from the air prove to be even more threatening than those on the ground. With greater flexibility in the direction of attacks, significantly increased range, and speed, they are extremely lethal.
With the increase of frequency in lance sweeps supplemented by feather shots, the Rover becomes overwhelmed.
Not only this, the jet black wings can also conjure up a column of tornado in place of the previous projectiles towards the Rover's way.
After the grueling battle, the mock-up knight fades away under Rover's blade. The Crownless failed to acquire its "crown".
The crown represents a child's rite of passage into adulthood, and it is also the Crownless' initial stage of imitating human beings. However, perhaps only when the Crownless truly understands the nature of human beings, can it find its own "crown" rather than merely imitate.
This battle merely marks the beginning of the encounter between the Rover and the Crownless.

entry.title: FAQ – PlayStation®5
entry.content:
Dear Rovers,
We are thrilled to announce that Wuthering Waves will officially launch on PlayStation®5 on January 2, 2025 (UTC+8). To help you seamlessly connect your PlayStation™Network (PSN) account with your Kuro Games account and sync your progress across platforms, we've prepared this guide. Please take a moment to review it to ensure a smooth start to your adventure in Solaris-3.
**Cross-Platform Progress Syncing**
**Q:** Will my progress on different servers or platforms be shared under the same Kuro Games account after the PS5™ launch?
**A:** Your progress will not be shared between different servers (e.g., Asia Server and Europe Server). However, within the same server, progress is synced across multiple platforms (PC, Android, iOS, and PS5™).
If you start your journey on PS5™, you can later switch to PC or mobile platforms by logging in with the same Kuro Games account linked to your PSN account. Your progress will carry over seamlessly. Similarly, if you begin on PC or mobile, you can continue on PS5™ using the same Kuro Games account.
**Q:** How can I sync my game progress between PS5™, PC, and mobile devices?
**A:** To enable cross-platform game progress syncing, please link your PSN account to your Kuro Games account. Make sure that the region of your PSN account matches the server where your game character was created.
Example 1: If the account character you wish to transfer progress from belongs to the North America server, you must use a PSN account from the America server to log in and bind it to a Kuro Account email to enable cross-platform progress synchronization.
Example 2: If the account character you wish to transfer progress from belongs to the Asia server, you must use a PSN account from the Japan or Korea servers to log in and bind it to a Kuro Account email to enable cross-platform progress synchronization.
※ Please note: If you are using a third-party login method such as Google or Facebook, you must first go to **Settings > Account Settings > User Center** in the game and complete the binding of a Kuro Account email to properly transfer your progress. Please note that verifying the registration email of the third-party login method (e.g., Google or Facebook) you used, without binding a Kuro Account email first, will not allow progress synchronization.
**Q:** Which servers are available for the PS5™ version of Wuthering Waves?
**A:** The PS5™ version supports Asia, Southeast Asia, Europe, America, and HMT (Hong Kong, Macau, Taiwan) servers. However, the available server is determined by the region of your PSN account. For example:
A PSN account registered in North America will access the America Server.
A PSN account registered in Hong Kong will access the HMT Server.
For more details on servers or to confirm your PSN account region, consult the table below or contact PlayStation Support.
| | | | | | | | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | | **Wuthering Waves Game Sever** | **Asia Server** | **America Server** | **Europe Server** | **SEA Server** | **HMT Server** | | **Region** | East Asia | North America, Central America and South America | Europe, Africa and Middle East | South Asia, South East Asia and Oceania | Hongkong, Macau and Taiwan | | **Corresponding Countries/Regions** | Japan, Korea | Argentina, Bolivia, Brazil, Canada, Chile, Colombia, Costa Rica, Ecuador, El Salvador, Guatemala, Honduras, Mexico, Nicaragua, Panama, Paraguay, Peru, the United States, Uruguay | Austria, Bahrain, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Kuwait, Lebanon, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Oman, Poland, Portugal, Qatar, Romania, Russia, Saudi Arabia, Slovakia, Slovenia, South Africa, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Turkey, Ukraine, United Arab Emirates, Great Britain | Australia, New Zealand, India, Indonesia, Malaysia, Singapore, Thailand | Hongkong, Macau and Taiwan |
**In-game Purchase**
**Q:** Can I use items purchased on PC/Android/iOS platforms (Lunites, Lunite Subscription, etc.) on PlayStation® after linking the account?
**A:** Yes, once your accounts are linked, any items purchased on one platform will be displayed and accessible on all other platforms.
**Q:** Why hasn't my purchase from the PlayStation™ Store/Web Store been delivered?
**A:** Items purchased through the PlayStation™Store or Web Store will be processed for delivery after you log into the game. If you're experiencing issues with delivery, please try the following methods:
Method 1: Restart the game and log in again to check if you've received a delivery notification.
Method 2: Check your inventory through "Terminal" > "Backpack" to see if the purchased items are there.
Method 3: Verify that the PSN account you're logged into is the same one used to make the purchase.
If none of these methods resolve the issue, please contact customer support via "Settings" > "Feedback" in-game.
**Q:** If I create a new game character on PS5™, can I make purchases for this account on PC/mobile?
**A:** Yes, you can make purchases for your account on PC, mobile, or the official website.
**Q:** I purchased a PS5™ pre-order bundle. Which game character will receive the items?
**A:** The pre-order bundle will be delivered to the game character of the Kuro Games account linked to your PS5™ when you first log into the game.
Note: To ensure the correct delivery of your pre-order bundle, please make sure the region of your PSN account matches the region of your Kuro Games account.
The pre-order bundle will be delivered immediately upon your first login.
For information on how to link your Kuro Games account to the correct PSN account server, please refer to the "Account Linking" and "Cross-Platform Progress Syncing" sections.
**Account Linking**
**Q:** How do I link my PSN account to my Kuro Games account?
**A:** You can choose one of the following two methods based on your situation:
Method 1: If you've previously created a Kuro Games account, it's recommended that you log in using your existing account. When you first enter Wuthering Waves on your PS5™, select "Already have an account? Log in" and follow the prompts to link your Kuro Games account with your current PSN account.
Note: For added account security, it's recommended that you set a password for your Kuro Games account in "Settings" > "Account Settings" > "User Center."
Method 2: If you don't have a Kuro Games account, you can create a new one using your current PSN account. When you first enter Wuthering Waves on your PS5™, select "Create a Kuro Games account" to log into the game.
Note: If you choose this method, we recommend linking your email and setting a password in-game in "Settings" > "Account Settings" > "User Center" so that you can later access the same account on other platforms.
**Q:** I've been playing Wuthering Waves on PC/mobile, and have already linked my PSN account to my Kuro Games account. But when I log into the game on PS5™, the progress is still not syncing. Why?
**A:**
**Situation 1:** The Kuro Games account linked to your PSN account is different from the one you used on PC/mobile.
After logging in on PS5™, go to "Settings" > "Account Settings" > "User Center" and check if the User ID linked to your PSN account matches the one you used on PC/mobile.
If you need to use a different Kuro Games account to log into Wuthering Waves, you can try the following methods:
Method 1: Create a PSN account with a region corresponding to your game character's server and follow the prompts after reopening the game.
Method 2: Use the in-game "Settings" > "Feedback" to request account unlinking support.
※Please note: After unlinking your account, some PlayStation Store bundles with purchase limit of one may be affected. The in-game item you receive may change if you've already exceeded the purchase limit on your Kuro Games account.
Example: You previously bought [Awakening Bundle] on PSN account A linked to your Kuro Games account, and successfully received the bundle content in game.
After linking your Kuro Games account to a new PSN account B and purchasing the same bundle again, you will not receive the same bundle items in game. Instead, you will receive [Lunites] equivalent to the bundle's value. Thank you for your understanding.
**Situation 2:** The region of your PSN account doesn't match the server of your game character.
Note: For information on how PSN account regions map to game servers, please refer to the "Cross-Platform Progress Syncing" section.
If this is the case, try the following steps:
1. Ensure that your Kuro Games account is linked to an email. You can verify this in "Settings" > "Account Settings" > "User Center" on PC/mobile. 2. Contact customer support for account unlinking support. 3. Create a new PSN account with a region corresponding to your game character's server. 4. Log in with the new PSN account and follow the prompts to link your Kuro Games account.
**Q:** How can I continue my progress from PS5™ on PC or mobile?
**A:** To carry over your game progress from PS5™ to PC or mobile, follow these steps:
1. Ensure your Kuro Games account is protected by a password. You can do this in "Settings" > "Account Settings" > "User Center" on PS5™. 2. When you open the game on PC or mobile, log in using the email linked to your PSN account and the password you set.
**Q:** How can I check which Kuro Games account is linked to my PSN account?
**A:** After logging into the game, you can check the linked Kuro Games account in "Settings" > "Account Settings" > "User Center."
**Q:** Can I unlink or change the Kuro Games account linked to my PSN account?
**A:** Yes, you can request to unlink your PSN account through "Settings" > "Feedback" in-game. After unlinking, your game progress under your Kuro Games account will not be lost, but it will no longer be synced with your PSN account. Please note that you can only unlink one PSN account per Kuro Games account, so proceed with caution.
Before unlinking, we recommend linking your email or setting a password via "Settings" > "Account Settings" > "User Center" to avoid losing access to your Kuro Games account once your PSN account is unlinked.
**Q:** Will I lose my game progress if I unlink my PSN account?
**A:** No, your game progress will not be lost. Unlinking the PSN account only removes the data sharing between the two accounts. You will still be able to use your Kuro Games account on other platforms to access your game progress.
**Q:** What if the game crashes before the linking window appears when I first log in on PS5™? Can I still link my accounts?
**A:** Yes, you can restart the game and linking will still be available.
**Q:** After linking my PSN account, can I log in on other platforms (e.g., PC, Android, iOS) using my PSN account, or use a different method to log in on PS5™?
**A:** No, currently the PS5™ version of Wuthering Waves only supports logging in with a PSN account that is linked to a Kuro Games account. Other platforms do not support logging in with a PSN account.
**Q:** Can I link multiple Kuro Games accounts to my PSN account? Or can my Kuro Games account be linked to multiple PSN accounts?
**A:** No, each PSN account can only be linked to one Kuro Games account. Similarly, each Kuro Games account can only be linked to one PSN account.
**Q:** How can I check which PSN account is currently linked?
**A:** You can check the linked PSN account via "Settings" > "Account Settings" > "User Center" in-game.
**Friends**
**Q:** How many friend lists can I see in the PS5™ version of Wuthering Waves? What's the difference between them?
**A:** On PS5™, you will see the following two friend lists:
Game Friends: Displays the friends you've added in the game, visible across all platforms.
PlayStation™Network Friends: Shows your PSN friends who have played Wuthering Waves and are on the same server as you, as well as friends who haven't played Wuthering Waves. This list is only visible on PlayStation®5.
**Q:** How can I see the User ID of a PlayStation™Network friend?
**A:** You can only view the User ID of a PSN friend if both of you are logged into the PlayStation® platform.

entry.title: [When Silence Tolls] Featured Resonator Convene: Boosted Drop Rate for Carlotta
entry.content:
During the event, 5-Star Resonator: Carlotta, 4-Star Resonators: Sanhua, Chixia, and Mortefi receive boosted drop rates!
✦Duration✦
Version 2.0 update - 2025-01-23 09:59 (server time)
✦Eligibility✦
Reach Union Level 8 or complete the combat trial in "First Resonance" and activate the Convene function.
✦Convene Rules✦
- [When Silence Tolls] is a Featured Resonator Convene event. Use Radiant Tide to convene. You are guaranteed at least one 4-Star or higher rarity Resonator or weapon every 10 attempts.
- The guarantee count is shared among all Featured Resonator Convene events and is carried over until a 5-Star Resonator is obtained.
- Featured Resonator Carlotta is exclusive to the [When Silence Tolls] Featured Resonator Convene and will not be available by other means once the event ends.
- Featured Resonator Carlotta's Waveband will be simultaneously made available in the Afterglow Coral Store with a limit of 2 purchases, and it will be removed once the Convene event ends.
- During the Convene, all Featured Resonators will be available in [Ascendant Aces] trial event. Complete the trial challenge with the Resonators to receive rewards.
※For more details, please refer to the Convene screen in-game.

entry.title: Fair Gaming Policy
entry.content:
Dear Rovers,
As part of our commitment to provide a fair and positive gaming experience for all Rovers in "Wuthering Waves", we will hold the principles below observed throughout our service:
1.**Strict Prohibition of the Disruption of Gaming Experience with Third-party Applications.**The use of illegal third-party tools such as cheating programs, accelerators, macro commands, etc. for the purpose of gaining unfair advantages (cheat) in game, including but not limited to automatic farming, cooldown alteration, invulnerability mode, teleportation, modification of game data, etc. is prohibited in all forms. Upon proving such use, we will immediately take actions, including but not limited to removal of illegal gains, account suspension, and permanent ban, depending on the degree and frequency of such use.
2.**Strict Prohibition of the Sale, Purchase, or Transfer of Accounts.**Rovers are reminded to stay alert to and reject any transaction or sharing of accounts. The loss or dispute arising otherwise shall be solely borne by Rovers pursuing those actions.
3.**Strict Prohibition of the Sale, Purchase, or Transfer of Test Qualifications.**Rovers are reminded to cherish their test qualifications and refrain from access to test qualifications via unofficial methods, lest unnecessary losses arise.
We have always been committed to maintaining a fair gaming experience in Wuthering Waves for all Rovers. In the event of any violation of the above principles, the relevant Rover's testing qualification will be immediately revoked. In the meantime, Rovers are encouraged to report any violations by contacting our [Customer Service]. Each report will be taken seriously and we will take severe action against any disruptive behavior.
To contact us, join our official discord channel: [https://discord.gg/wutheringwaves](<https://discord.com/invite/wutheringwaves>) and message our official Discord Customer Service account: Breezes#7797
Or email us at: wutheringwaves\_ensupport@kurogame.com
In order to maintain a fair and positive gaming experience in Wuthering Waves, we sincerely request all Rovers' cooperation. Thank you for your understanding and support!
**Wuthering Waves Dev Team**

entry.title: Version 2.0: All Silent Souls Can Sing Patch Notes
entry.content:
Dear Rovers, Thank you for your continued support. We are excited to announce that Version 2.0: All Silent Souls Can Sing will become available soon!
[Maintenance Time & Compensation Details] ✦Maintenance Time: 2025-01-02 04:00 to 2025-01-02 11:00 (UTC+8) ✦Maintenance Compensation: Astrite x300, Crystal Solvent x2 ✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-01-02 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update. ※In the event that the maintenance is extended, the dev team will issue a follow-up notice and adjust the compensation accordingly.
✦Bug Fixes Compensation: Astrite x300 ✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-01-02 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.
[Version 2.0 Preview] ✦New Region✦ Rinascita Ragunna, in southern Rinascita, holds the closest bond with their Sentinel Imperator among the nation's many city-states. Most Ragunnesi worship the Sentinel, viewing Common Echoes as divine blessings. Ragunna is also home to the Order of the Deep, widely regarded as the Sentinel's earthly emissaries. The Black Shores report that the Threnodian in Ragunna remains dormant. In recent years, however, even Sentinel Imperator has fallen silent, no longer speaking directly to the Ragunnesi...
※When Version 2.0 goes live, Rovers who reach Union Level 14 and complete Main Quest Chapter I Act III "Ominous Star" can access Main Quest Fast Track "Next Stop: Rinascita" to unlock and participate in Main Quest Chapter II Prologue "Through the Sea Thou Break."
✦New Resonators✦ 5-Star Resonator: Carlotta (Glacio) The second daughter of Montelli and an art investor unbound by convention, Carlotta moves seamlessly through social circles and business transactions while quietly handling the family's unspeakable "troubles" in secret. The blooming of a "gem," the taking of a life—In her own name, she reshapes reality, giving it a new dimension. ✦Combat Roles: Main Damage Dealer, Resonance Skill DMG ※Obtainable through the [When Silence Tolls] Featured Resonator Convene.
5-Star Resonator: Roccia (Havoc) Assistant, prop master, and improv comedian, Roccia is always there to make sure the Fool's Troupe is at the ready. The Magic Box she carries appears to hold the world, or perhaps she had recreated a world inside the box. ✦Combat Roles: Concerto Efficiency, Heavy Attack DMG, Traction, Havoc DMG Amplification, Basic Attack DMG Amplification ※Obtainable through the [Stage in the Box] Featured Resonator Convene.
✦New Weapons✦ 5-Star Weapon: The Last Dance (Pistols) The radiant crystals, ever shattering and reshaping, beckon you into a treacherous dance, a gamble where life is the wager. Cortado, cortado... relentlessly draw each other in until all we can hear are our quivers. When the crimson finale arrives, remember, death comes for all. ※Obtainable through the [The Last Dance] Featured Weapon Convene.
5-Star Weapon: Tragicomedy (Gauntlets) The joys and sorrows of life dance in an endless circle; pain and tears shift in an instant into a carnival. ※Obtainable through the [Tragicomedy] Featured Weapon Convene.
4-Star Weapon: Call of the Abyss (Rectifier) Held by the keepers of this land, this scepter was once a symbol of dominion over its people and the architectural marvels they achieved. However, it has long lost its luster, and its grandeur blends into the ripples of the pipe organ melodies of Rinascita. ※Obtain the weapon and its Crafting Recipe by completing Exploration Quests "Shadow of the Towers: Twilight Rise," "Shadow of the Towers: Resounding Rise," and "Shadow of the Towers: Command Rise."
4-Star Weapon Series (Poetry and Paean): Meditations on Mercy (Broadblade), Fables of Wisdom (Sword), Romance in Farewell (Pistols), Legend of Drunken Hero (Gauntlets), Waltz in Masquerade (Rectifier) ※Obtain the weapons' Crafting Recipes while exploring Rinascita.
✦New Echoes✦ Hecate, Lorelei, Dragon of Dirge, Sentry Construct, Questless Knight, Diurnus Knight, Nocturnus Knight, Abyssal Gladius, Abyssal Mercator, Abyssal Patricius, Chop Chop, Vitreum Dancer, Cuddle Wuddle, Chop Chop: Leftless, Chop Chop: Rightless, Chop Chop: Headless, Fae Ignis, Nimbus Wraith, Hocus Pocus, Lottie Lost, Diggy Duggy, Frostscourge Stalker, Voltscourge Stalker, Galescourge Stalker, Chest Mimic, Nightmare: Feilian Beringal, Nightmare: Impermanence Heron, Nightmare: Thundering Mephis, Nightmare: Tempest Mephis, Nightmare: Crownless, Nightmare: Inferno Rider, Nightmare: Mourning Aix
✦New Stories✦ Main Quest Chapter II: Even When Divinity Remains Silent. As you looked into the repaired Tethys System for ways to solve Abby's bodily issues, you stumbled upon a Beacon you had set for yourself. Your past self pointed you in the direction of the distant land across the sea. Time to set forth for Ragunna, Rover. Brave the storms and undercurrents to reach the grand celebration that awaits—and to honor the pact you made long ago.
Main Quest Chapter II Prologue: Through the Sea Thou Break Main Quest Chapter II Act I: The Sacred Breeze So Often Breathes Main Quest Chapter II Act II: Veils Off in Sun or Shadow Main Quest Chapter II Act III: What Yesterday Wept, Today Doth Sing✦Duration: Permanently available after the Version 2.0 update ※When Version 2.0 goes live, Rovers who reach Union Level 14 and complete Main Quest Chapter I Act III "Ominous Star" can access Main Quest Fast Track "Next Stop: Rinascita" to unlock and participate in Main Quest Chapter II Prologue ""Through the Sea Thou Break."" Chapter II progress is saved separately from Chapter I progress. Taking on Chapter II early does not affect your progress in Chapter I. ※We recommend completing Chapter I Act VIII "To the Shore's End" before starting Chapter II for optimal experience.
Carlotta's Companion Story: If On a Rainy Night a Family The bitter night lingers for the restless. An invitation from the Montelli family pulls you into its past, where new and old, balance and change collide. In the freest place of Ragunna, the host of the invitation awaits your arrival. ✦Duration: Permanently available after the Version 2.0 update ✦Eligibility: Reach Union Level 20 and complete Main Quest Chapter II Act III "What Yesterday Wept, Today Doth Sing."
Roccia's Companion Story: Starry is the Night What do the exiled "pilgrims" truly need? Food? Shelter? And perhaps, a ray of starry light, a symbol of hope? Now, with Roccia by your side, the time has come to seek out that light... ✦Duration: Permanently available after 2025-01-23 10:00 (server time) ✦Eligibility: Reach Union Level 20 and complete Main Quest Chapter II Act III "What Yesterday Wept, Today Doth Sing."
✦New Events✦ [Rinascita] Regional Events Participate in Tales of the Isles: Area Exploration Event, where you collect Stamps to increase Event Level, earning rewards and unlocking Amidst the Sea of Clouds. Participate in Traces of Tides: Photo Collection Event, where you explore Rinascita and capture beautiful moments. ✦Duration: Version 2.0 update - 2025-02-12 03:59 (server time)
[Gifts of Joyous Tunes] 7-Day Login Event During the event, log in daily to claim the day's login rewards. ✦Rewards: Radiant Tide x5, Lustrous Tide x5 ✦Duration: Version 2.0 update - 2025-02-12 03:59 (server time)
[Dances For Spring's Return] Companion Invitation Login Event During the event, you can invite one Companion to join you in the event every day. After the invitation, you can claim the corresponding rewards on the event page. Complete all invitations to claim Sanhua's exclusive Outfit, "Exorcistic Adjuration." ✦Rewards: Exorcistic Adjuration x1, Crystal Solvent x10, Premium Sealed Tube x30, Premium Tuner x100, Premium Resonance Potion x10, Premium Energy Core x10 ✦Duration: 2025-01-23 10:00 - 2025-02-13 03:59 (server time)
[Celebration Aftertunes] Gratitude for Companionship Food, drink, songs, and laughter—amid the season of revelry, we keep the festivities alive without pause. How do you like your time in Rinascita, Rover? Aftertunes of the celebration still linger, and now, a couple of friends are preparing to send you their heartfelt wishes and gifts... ✦Rewards: Astrite x1600 ✦Duration: 2025-01-29 00:00 - 2025-02-13 03:59 (UTC+8)
[Although Colors Have No Form] Featured Co-op Combat Event Claudia asks you to investigate the world within the painting and gives you a protective talisman. Within the painted world, the talisman transforms into various Echoes to assist you. ✦Duration: 2025-01-09 10:00 - 2025-01-30 03:59 (server time)
[Wuthering Exploration] Featured Exploration Event: Nimbus Sanctum Complete daily Survey Tasks to obtain Survey Points, which can be exchanged for various rewards. ✦Duration: 2025-01-16 10:00 - 2025-01-30 03:59 (server Time)
[John Wicktorio: No Debts for Old Men] Featured Combat Event During the event, you will enter a special sphere to battle waves of enemies within a set time limit, with the aid of unique buffs. ✦Duration: 2025-01-23 10:00 - 2025-02-09 03:59 (server time)
[Lollo Campaign: Comeback] Featured Commission Event Complete Lollo Campaigns to obtain Lollo Stamps, each of which can be exchanged for a special delivery from Lollo Helper, granting you one spin on the wheel lottery. ✦Duration: 2025-01-30 10:00 - 2025-02-13 03:59 (server time)
[Pincer Maneuver Warriors] Recurring Combat Event Challenge waves of powerful enemies by controlling two teams with special buffs across two separate simulated battlefields. ✦Duration✦ Pincer Maneuver Warriors Ⅲ: Version 2.0 update - 2025-01-23 09:59 (server time) Pincer Maneuver Warriors Ⅳ: 2025-01-23 10:00 - 2025-02-12 11:59 (server time)
✦Other New Content✦ ✦New Tactical Hologram Challenges: Tactical Hologram - Phantom Pain ✦New Gameplay Feature: Amidst the Sea of Clouds ✦New Phantom Echoes: Phantom - Sentry Construct, Phantom - Questless Knight, Phantom - Vitreum Dancer ✦New Feature: Outfits (New Outfits: Exorcistic Adjuration, Peach Blossom) ※Participate in Glamour Couture to try out Jinhsi's Outfit "Peach Blossom." ※Participate in Dances For Spring's Return: Companion Invitation Login Event to claim Sanhua's Signature Outfit "Exorcistic Adjuration" for free.
[Adjustments and Optimizations] ✦Resonators and Weapons✦ Outfits: New Feature - Resonator Outfits - Give the current Resonator a new look by switching to a new Outfit. - Switching between Outfits does not change the Resonator's stats. - After switching to a new Outfit, you can equip the Resonator with the Weapon Projection associated with the Outfit.
[Injured] Visual Effects: Added [Injured] Visual Effects - When Resonators have been in combat for over 20 seconds and have taken more than 7 hits, taking another hit triggers the [Injured] visual effects. - To remove the [Injured] visual effects, use Fast Travel or switch the current Resonator off the field and stay out of combat for 20 seconds. ※Please note that in Version 2.0, the [Injured] visual effects are not available for Resonators who engage in combat wearing Outfits other than their original ones. We expect to include [Injured] visual effects for Resonator Outfits in Version 2.1. ※Please note that the [Injured] visual effects is enabled by default in Version 2.0. We expect to add a toggle option for this feature in Version 2.1.
✦Features✦ Synthesis: New Feature - Synthesis on the Go - Access Synthesis on your Terminal page. - Use Synthesis - Purification to quickly synthesize materials of different Rarities; you will have a clear view of the current quantities of the materials. - Use Synthesis - Conversion to convert two materials into one new material that is in the same category and of the same Rarity.
Change Appearance: New Feature - Change Appearance - You can switch between the two Rovers via Settings > Other > Player Setting. - This feature has a 24-hour cooldown.
Immersion Mode: New Feature - Immersion Mode - Enable Immersion Mode via Settings > Other > HUD Interface. Certain HUD information will be hidden. - Disable Immersion Mode with the keyboard shortcut or the icon in the top-left corner of the main screen.
Archive of Melodies: New Feature - Archive of Melodies - Unlock in-game music tracks by delivering Melody Boxes to Aria Mummers. - Aria Mummers can play any track you select from your Archive of Melodies. - Set a selected track as the background music around Aria Mummer.
Exploration Progress: Optimized Exploration Progress - Increase Exploration Progress in each region to unlock rewards. - Reach the required Exploration Progress percentage in a region to obtain an Exploration Report. - Track Quest, Challenge, or Item Collection progress for each region.
✦Leveling✦ Limited-Time Early Access to Challenges: Opened limited-time early access to challenges that drop desired materials - Gain early access to and participate in certain Weekly Challenges and Boss Challenges to obtain materials for Resonator Ascension. - The Weekly Challenges and Boss Challenges open for early access are subject to which Resonators feature in the current Featured Resonator Convenes. ※This feature is designed for your convenience. Please note that using this feature may result in spoilers.
Data Bank: Raised the level cap of the Data Bank to Lv.24. ※When your Data Bank reaches Lv.21, the drop rate of 5-Star Echoes increases to 100%.
Daily Activity: - Added a new Activity Points task - Login. - Adjusted the list of Activity Points tasks (deletions and additions were made).
✦Challenges, Puzzles, & Events✦ - Adjusted the rules under which red dots appear regarding Somnium Labyrinth: Somnoire Adventure Event.
✦Controls✦ - Added keyboard shortcuts for Discarding or Locking a selected Echo in Keyboard & Mouse mode. - Added Synthesis to the Quick Access Wheel menu. - Added keyboard shortcuts for Discarding or Locking a selected Echo in Controller mode. - Optimized the display of the icons in the top right corner of the main interface in Controller mode. - Added a feature in Controller mode that allows you to bring up information about the location being tracked by pressing down the left joystick with the Map page displayed. - Optimized the controller vibration when using DualShock®4, DualSense®, and DualSense Edge™ to play the PC version of the game.
✦UI✦ - Optimized the layout and interactivity of the Map interface. - Optimized the display of the Login screen. - Optimized the display of the Activity screen.
✦Graphics & Performance✦ - Added real-time volumetric clouds, making the clouds in the new region, Rinascita, look more realistic. - Added dynamic color adjustments, lending vibrant colors to the vegetation in Rinascita. - Added special visual effects to better present polar-day and polar-night phenomena, in order to create an atmosphere or a mood suitable for a specific scene. - Optimized the visual effects and interactivity of certain water surfaces and beaches. - Optimized CPU usage for NPCs, allowing more NPCs to appear on the screen at the same time; your device will perform more smoothly when displaying the same number of NPCs. - Optimized the lighting effects on Mobile when the graphic quality is set to "Ultra Performance" or "Performance."

Backstory pages for the Resonators "Encore" and "Yangyang." - Fixed an issue where switching to another Resonator from the Resonators "Chixia," "Mortefi," or "Aalto" while they took aim to perform a Heavy Attack sometimes resulted in the character model not disappearing under certain circumstances. - Features - Fixed an issue in Co-op mode where one of the character models sometimes became immobile when switching between Resonators. - Fixed an issue where the character model sometimes behaved abnormally while moving around upon exiting Co-op mode. - Fixed an issue in Co-op mode where an enemy moved abnormally when attacked by 2P or 3P Rover. - Fixed an issue where 2P or 3P Rover could not join Co-op mode. - Fixed an issue where opening the Map through the touchpad of a DualSense® or DualSense Edge™ controller sometimes failed to take effect. - Fixed an issue where Trophy "Point Zero" and the Trophy series "Defeat ~ with other players in Co-op Mode once" (part of Trophies - Cross-Realm Ties) could not be obtained under certain circumstances. - Fixed an issue where the Trophies "Starry Hearts" and "Unboxing the Terminal" could not be obtained under certain circumstances. - Fixed an issue where the automatic exit countdown on the Results screen sped up under certain circumstances. - Fixed an issue where certain Quest Items in the Backpack appeared more than once after completing a quest. - Fixed an issue where the loading image was displayed incorrectly while entering the domain "the End of Wandering." - Fixed an issue where Waypoints could be activated while in elevators located in the Black Shores region. - Fixed an issue where opening the Backpack sometimes caused the "The above items have expired" prompt to appear on the screen.

entry.title: V2.0 Wuthering Waves Battle Rush

Dear Rovers,
The Wuthering Waves Battle Rush is now live! Record and share your most exciting battle moments with the hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle on X (Twitter)/YouTube Shorts/TikTok to compete for a reward of Astrite x2,000 and a chance to get featured on our social media with direct credits! Other than these rewards, 10 extra winners will be selected to receive a $50 Amazon Gift Card.
Showcase your outstanding battle tactics in a condensed clip and share them with us!

Create your own combat video featuring Wuthering Waves.
We require no limits to the characters, level, or scenes. All entries that feature your combat in Wuthering Waves are qualified to join the event and compete for rewards!

Post your work on X (Twitter)/YouTube Shorts/TikTok with both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle included publicly.

You can submit multiple entries. However, the same work published on different platforms will not count towards the rewards.
Entries listed below may be excluded from the judging process:
\*Works not created in accordance with Wuthering Waves
\*Works found to contain plagiarism or infringement of intellectual property rights

\*Works that have already been used for commercial purposes

This event is open to submissions from all languages, as creators proficient in any language are eligible to compete for rewards. Entries differing only in language will be treated as equivalent works.

Limit of one reward redemption per account. For more information on Discord Quests, please visit [Discord Quest Help Center](<https://support.discord.com/hc/articles/22225719947543>).
How to Participate
To complete the V2.0 WUWA Discord Quest on PC, players who meet the eligibility criteria must play Wuthering Waves while running the Discord desktop app simultaneously. If players who meet the eligibility criteria decide to complete the Quest on console, the Quest tracking will begin as long as your Discord account is connected via console. For guidance on how to connect and complete the Fortnite Quest on console, you can refer to the following:
- [Discord and PlayStation® Network Connection FAQ](<https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/4419534960919-Discord-and-PlayStation-Network-Connection-FAQ>)
Redemption Instructions
Once you have completed the Quest by playing 15 minutes of Wuthering Waves, you will receive a reward code in **Quest Bar or Quest Home**. For detailed instructions on how to claim your reward code, please refer to [Discord Quests FAQ](<https://support.discord.com/hc/articles/22225719947543-Discord-Quests-FAQ#h_01HVPBZR5FKKSQ3R1JXB9E4DM3>).
After claiming your reward code, please follow the steps below to redeem it in the game：
1. Select your server and enter Wuthering Waves, and then go to [Settings] - [Other] - [Redemption Code]. 2. Enter the [Redemption Code] and hit [Confirm] to redeem rewards. You can then claim them in your in-game mail. 3. The [Redemption Code] function will be unlocked once you've reached Union Level 2. 4. The Redemption Code obtained in this event will expire on 2025/3/11 at 08:00 (PT). Redemption Codes that expire will be unable to be redeemed.
Discord Quest FAQ
**Q: Is there a limit on how many Quests I can redeem on my Discord account?**
A: Eligible users can redeem one of each of the available Quest campaigns on their Discord account.
For more information on Discord Quests, visit our [Discord Quest Help Center](<https://support.discord.com/hc/articles/22225719947543>).
**Q: Is this feature/promotion available in my region?**
A: Some Quests will not be available in all regions based on terms and conditions. If you are in an ineligible region for a Quest, you will not be able to complete it.
Additionally, Discord’s premium services are restricted in some regions. If you are unable to access the Gift Inventory, you are not eligible for Quests.
**Q: I have concerns or questions regarding privacy and Quests.**
A: We encourage you to review [Discord’s Privacy Policy](<https://discord.com/privacy>) for further details about how we use your information. You can head over to our [Data Used for In-Game Rewards](<https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/22225542459415>) article, to learn more about how we use data for Quests.
**Q: Why am I unable to complete Quest while using Linux?**
A: Currently, Quest rewards are unable to be earned on Linux devices.
However, Discord team is looking into a resolution for this issue so that earning Quest rewards is possible on Linux in the future. For now, we recommend completing the requirement on a different operating system, like Windows or MacOS.
Discord support team does not have an exact ETA for when a solution will be available, and won't be able to provide any status updates on this specific issue.
**Q: I no longer see a Quest. Where did it go?**
A: Quests are typically only available for a limited amount of time. If you no longer see a Quest in the Quest Home or in-app notifications about the quest, the period to complete and claim the reward for the Quest is over.

entry.title: How to Use Wuwa Bot?
entry.content:
**1. Account Binding**
Before using Wuwa Bot, you must link your account to the server. Use the command /bind to initiate account linking and click the provided link to access the account linking interface and complete the login process:
a) Log in to KURO GAMES Passport
b) Log in to Discord
Once logged in, the page will detect your status. Click the "Link Account" button to complete the process.
**2. Start Using Wuwa Bot**
Wuwa Bot offers 7 commands. After successfully linking your account with the /bind command, you can access various features.
/welcome:
Welcome players to start using Wuwa Bot, where you can view all available commands and general functional descriptions.
/create:
Create a character profile based on your selected character
/language:
1. The system language for Wuwa Bot matches your Discord language settings. To change the bot's interaction language, adjust your Discord language settings.
2. To switch the language for generated character profiles, use the /language command.
/unbind:
Use this command to unlink your account if needed.
/help:
Access a tutorial for using Wuwa Bot, with a link to detailed user guides.
/invite:
Obtain the invitation link for Wuwa Bot and add it to other servers.
If you have any suggestions or encounter issues while using Wuwa Bot, please contact Discord's official customer service or moderators for assistance.

entry.title: V2.1 Wuthering Waves Battle Rush
entry.content:
Dear Rovers,
The Wuthering Waves Battle Rush is now live! Record and share your most exciting battle moments with the hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle on X (Twitter)/YouTube Shorts/TikTok to compete for a reward of Astrite x2,000 and a chance to get featured on our social media with direct credits! Other than these rewards, 10 extra winners will be selected to receive a $50 Amazon Gift Card.
Showcase your outstanding battle tactics in a condensed clip and share them with us!
**Content Requirement**
Create your own combat video featuring Wuthering Waves.
We require no limits to the characters, level, or scenes. All entries that feature your combat in Wuthering Waves are qualified to join the event and compete for rewards!
**How to Submit**
Post your work on X (Twitter)/YouTube Shorts/TikTok with both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle included publicly.
**Submission Period**
2025/02/12 - 2025/03/19 (PT)
**Judging Criteria**
All eligible works will undergo evaluation based on their adherence to the theme, degree of completion, reception among players, and other relevant factors.
**Notes**
To qualify for participation, you should include both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuwaBattle in your post.
Deleted posts will not be qualified for entitlement of rewards.
You can submit multiple entries. However, the same work published on different platforms will not count towards the rewards.
Entries listed below may be excluded from the judging process:
\*Works not created in accordance with Wuthering Waves
\*Works found to contain plagiarism or infringement of intellectual property rights
\*Works submitted outside the event period
\*Works created with the assistance of AI technology
\*Works featuring extremely aggressive content, including but not limited to themes of pornography, violence, politics, or racism
\*Works that have already been used for commercial purposes
\*Works deemed inappropriate by the judges
Failure to reply to the official staff within 7 days from the date of notification will be considered a waiver of entitlement to the rewards.
This event is open to submissions from all languages, as creators proficient in any language are eligible to compete for rewards. Entries differing only in language will be treated as equivalent works.
This event is available solely to participants on the designated servers listed below: America, Europe, Asia, SEA, HMT(HK,MO,TW).

entry.title: Patch Notes for Version 2.1: Waves Sing, and the Cerulean Bird Calls
entry.content:
Dear Rover,
Thank you for your continued support. We are excited to announce that Version 2.1: Waves Sing, and the Cerulean Bird Calls will become available soon!
[Maintenance Time & Compensation Details]
**✦Maintenance Time:** **2025-02-13 04:00 - 2025-02-13 11:00 (UTC+8)**
**✦Maintenance Compensation: Astrite x300, Crystal Solvent x2**
**✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-02-13 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.**
※In the event that the maintenance is extended, the dev team will issue a follow-up notice and adjust the compensation accordingly.
**✦Bug Fixes Compensation: Astrite x300**
**✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-02-13 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.**
**[Version Update Details]**
**✦New Resonators✦**
**5-Star Resonator: Phoebe** (Spectro)
Phoebe, Acolyte of the Order of the Deep, is a young woman of quiet devotion. With a kind heart, she fulfills her duties with unwavering diligence. Her prayers, like the light she carries, offer comfort and peace to all.
✦Combat Roles: Main Damage Dealer, Concerto Efficiency, Spectro Frazzle
※Obtainable through the [With Hushed Whispers] Featured Resonator Convene.
**5-Star Resonator: Brant** (Fusion)
Brant, the captain of Rinascita's Troupe of Fools, is a free spirit and romantic. Unpredictable and full of life, he is the beating heart of the troupe.
On stage, he slips into countless roles, donning new masks to breathe life into every story. Yet beyond the spotlight, he is unwaveringly genuine, offering nothing but true sincerity to those around him.
✦Combat Roles: Support and Healer, Basic Attack DMG, Fusion DMG Amplification, Resonance Skill DMG Amplification
※Obtainable through the [Blaze Across the Deep] Featured Resonator Convene.
**✦New Weapons✦**
**5-Star Weapon: Luminous Hymn** (Rectifier)
"The Sentinel's grace, how sweet thou art. Our home was lost, but found at last. With twigs between my beaks, I brave the waves. Bound by love, we're crowned with holy light."
※Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation - Luminous Hymn] Featured Weapon Convene.
**5-Star Weapon: Unflickering Valor** (Sword)
Blistering winds and crashing waves, the sea devours all. Only a lonely boat lamp stands alight!
Onwards! Towards the edge of the world you shall sail!
※Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation - Unflickering Valor] Featured Weapon Convene.
**4-Star Weapon: Ocean's Gift** (Rectifier)
To fishers, the sea is their field of harvest. Harvest means hope.
※Participate in "Old Man and the Whale: Fishing Adventure Event" to obtain the weapon and items for increasing its Syntonization Rank for free.
**✦New Regions✦**
**[Vault Underground]**
Located on the underground level of Averardo Bank, this vault is the beating heart of the Montelli family's wealth, where the highest concentration of riches in Ragunna can be found.
Aside from conventional collectibles, it boasts a huge collection of Echoes. It's rumored that in its bowels lies a secret cache that the Montellis hold dear.
※Accessible by elevator during Exploration Quest "Silent As a Falling Leaf."
**[Riccioli Islands]**
A cluster of islands off the shores of Rinascita, surprisingly tranquil amid turbulent waters. These remote islands are largely deserted, visited only by fishers out at sea and those who stumble on them by chance.
※Accessible during Tutorial Quest "Set Sail! Pro Angler!"
**✦New Stories✦**
**[Exploration Quest] Silent as a Falling Leaf**
You receive two letters, one from the Montelli family and the other from the Order, asking you to bear witness to the formation of their good relations and assist in escorting the Order's collection to the Montelli family's vault.
What secrets will be uncovered in the Averardo Vault, where a secret cache is said to be kept?
✦Duration: Permanently available after the Version 2.1 update.
✦Eligibility: Complete Main Quest Chapter II Act III "What Yesterday Wept, Today Doth Sing."
**[Brant's Companion Story] Sail Day, Captain!**
What would the Captain of the Fool's Troupe normally do? Impromptu performance? A great adventure? Why not hear it straight from Brant himself? A captivating journey surely awaits!
✦Duration: Permanently available after 2025-03-06 10:00 (server time)
✦Eligibility: Reach Union Level 20 and complete Main Quest Chapter II Act III "What Yesterday Wept, Today Doth Sing."
**✦New Echoes✦**
Rage Against the Statue, Golden Junrock, Calcified Junrock, Aero Prism, Hurriclaw
**✦New Events & Gameplay Features✦**
**New Events:**
[Old Man and the Whale] Fishing Adventure Event
During the event, join Phoebe on a captivating voyage in the Riccioli Islands. Steer the Gondola "Rachel" and fish for unique, local species to boost your Fame and become a true fishing master!
✦Duration: Version 2.1 update - 2025-03-26 03:59 (server time)
✦Eligibility: Reach Union Level 14 and complete Main Quest "Through the Sea Thou Break" (complete the quest "Silent as a Falling Leaf" first for a better experience).
※When the Limited-time Event period ends, Limited-time Event rewards will no longer be available, but the event will become a Permanent Event, allowing you to participate at any time and win Permanent Event rewards.
[Gifts of Blue Water] 7-Day Login Event
During the event, log in daily to claim the day's login rewards.
✦Rewards: Radiant Tide x5, Lustrous Tide x5
✦Duration: Version 2.1 update - 2025-03-26 03:59 (server time)
[Apex Ragunna] Featured Co-op Overdash Event
During the event, you can invite other players to join the Overdash Challenge in Co-op Mode. The first to finish is the winner.
✦Duration: 2025-02-20 10:00 - 2025-03-10 03:59 (server time)
[Tactical Simulacra Ⅲ] Featured Combat Event
In Tactical Simulacra Ⅲ, challenge waves of powerful enemies by using special buffs across different simulation domains.
✦Duration: 2025-02-27 10:00 - 2025-03-13 03:59 (server time)
[Infinite Battle Simulation Ⅱ] Featured Arena Combat Event
In the Infinite Battle Simulation, defeat enemies and open supply chests to earn Tactic Points and Low-Capacity Variables.
✦Duration: 2025-03-06 10:00 - 2025-03-27 03:59 (server time)
[Beyond the Waves] Featured Exploration Event
Participate and upload your exploration record at the Lollo courier truck to get various rewards!
✦Duration: 2025-03-13 04:00 - 2025-03-27 03:59 (server time)
**New Gameplay Features:**
[Whimpering Wastes] New Permanent Challenge Gameplay
Born of evil tides, swarms of Tacet Discords weave a deadly web, luring every passing soul... Once again, it falls to you to cleanse these treacherous waters.
✦Availability: After the Version 2.1 update
✦Eligibility: Reach Union Level 30 and complete Tutorial Quest "Ocean Is a Soul's Rest."
[Fantasies of the Thousand Gateways] New Weekly Combat Gameplay
A familiar gateway emerges in the land of Rinascita, connecting to a realm known as the Somnoire. Past memories lie buried deep within dreams, and the key to exploration is in your hands. Please do not forget, only within dreams will the answers be revealed.
✦Availability: From 2025-02-17 04:00 (server time)
✦Eligibility: Reach Union Level 30 and unlock the Resonance Nexus in Ragunna City during Main Quest "The Sacred Breeze So Often Breathes."
**✦Others✦**
✦New "Tactical Hologram: Phantom Pain" Challenge: Hecate
✦New Weapon Projection: Projection - Ocean's Gift
✦New Phantom Echo: Phantom - Lorelei
※Participate in "Old Man and the Whale" to obtain Weapon Projection "Projection - Ocean's Gift" and Phantom Echo "Phantom - Lorelei" for free.
**[Adjustments and Optimizations]**
**✦Resonators & Weapons✦**
- Added the On/Off option for injury effects, accessible via Settings > Graphics > Custom.
**✦Features✦**
Echoes:
New Feature: Echo Suggestion
- Access the Echo Suggestion feature through the character’s Echo Assembly interface to view recommended Echoes for the current character.
- If multiple Sonata Effects are recommended, the usage percentage for each Resonance effect will be displayed separately.
- From the Echo Suggestion interface, you can navigate to the Sonata Gallery to view more detailed information about Echo sets.
New Feature: Mainstat & Substat Filtering
- In the Echo Equipment details interface, you can now filter combinations of Mainstat and Substat attributes based on your needs.
New Feature: Echo Preset
- Access the Echo Preset feature by clicking the Echo Preset icon in the bottom-right corner of the character’s Echo Assembly interface.
- Select the Current Setup column and use Save As Preset to save the equipped Echo lineup for the Resonator. After entering a preset name, it will be saved as an Echo Preset. Select any saved preset and use Apply to equip it to the current Resonator.
- Expand the attribute comparison interface to directly compare the differences between the Current Setup and other Echo Presets.
- Up to 20 Echo Preset configurations can be saved.
- Increased the storage limit for Backpack - Echoes to 3,000.
Camera Mode:
New Feature: Filter
- In Camera mode, apply a filter (e.g. Vivid, Dystopian, Film, Noir) to your photos.
- You can also adjust the intensity of said filters.
New Feature: Idel Animation Poses
-New poses are added for certain Resonators to offer you more options when taking photos.
※More posing styles will be made available in future versions. Please stay tuned.
- Enhanced the image quality and adjusted the image dimensions in Camera mode.
- Optimized the usability of the "Camera Position" function. Use it to move the camera up, down, left, or right for optimal angles.
- Optimized the "Reset" function. Use it to restore the camera to its initial state.
**✦Challenges, Puzzles, & Events✦**
- Added prompts to indicate when certain gameplay features are unavailable.
- When you are in the middle of completing a quest or engaging with a gameplay feature, other features or challenges may become temporarily unavailable. You can check the Map to see if a specific feature or challenge is available by looking at the corresponding icon.
- Adjusted the accessibility of certain gameplay features in the Rinascita - Fagaceae Peninsula area.
- After the Version 2.1 update, you will no longer be able to access the "Dream Patrol: Knight in a Storm" and "Nightmare: Tempest Mephis" challenges in this area during the Exploration Quest "Where Wind Returns to Celestial Realms." These challenges will become available again once you complete the Exploration Quest.
- Adjusted the accessibility of Utility in certain Tacet Fields.

- Adjusted the cursor speed in Controller mode under different frame rates.
**✦UI✦**
- Adjusted the layout of the Quests menu.
**✦Graphics & Performance✦**
- Added the [120fps] option for devices equipped with specific graphics cards. Users with NVIDIA RTX 50 Series graphics cards can enable this option via Settings > Graphics > Frame Rate.
- Added Ray Tracing for devices with NVIDIA RTX 40 Series graphics cards. Choose "Low," "Medium," or "High" in Settings > Graphics > Ray Tracing, or select specific effects like "Ray-Traced Reflections" or "Ray-Traced Global Illumination."
- Added DLSS Frame Generation for devices with NVIDIA RTX 40 Series graphics cards. Access this feature via Settings > Graphics > Advanced > Frame Generation. Enable this option to generate additional frames.
※After enabling Frame Generation, ensure that the "Hardware-Accelerated GPU Scheduling" option is enabled in "Settings > System > Display > Graphics Settings" on Windows before rebooting your PC. If you encounter performance issues such as FPS drops or stuttering, verify that the "Hardware-Accelerated GPU Scheduling" option is enabled. If the issue persists, contact Customer Support for assistance.
- Upgraded NVIDIA DLSS to Version 3.7, offering improved Super Resolution and Frame Generation effects when enabled. The "Settings > Graphics > Super Resolution" option has been reset to "Auto."

Please stay tuned for official announcements regarding the availability of these features for other graphics cards.

- Optimized the display of the names of certain NPCs.
