entry.title: Version 2.2: Tangled Truth in Inverted Tower Patch Notes
entry.content:
Dear Rover, Thank you for your continued support. The following is a summary of content that will become available in Version 2.2: Tangled Truth in Inverted Tower.
**[Maintenance Time & Compensation Details]** **✦Maintenance Time: 2025-03-27 04:00 - 2025-03-27 11:00 (UTC+8)** **✦Maintenance Compensation: Astrite x300, Crystal Solvent x2** **✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-03-27 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.** ※In the event that the maintenance is extended, the dev team will issue a follow-up notice and adjust the compensation accordingly.
**✦Bug Fixes Compensation: Astrite x300** **✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-03-27 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.**
**[Version Update Details]** **✦New Resonators✦** **5-Star Resonator: Cantarella (Havoc/Rectifier)** The current head of Fisalia, Cantarella, the Bane. A mysterious noblewoman, her beauty as captivating as it is perilous. She resides in a crown-like castle perched atop the mountain, where illusory dreams flow like streams, meticulously spun by her own hands. ●Combat Roles: Support and Healer, Concerto Efficiency, Basic Attack DMG, Coordinated Attack, Havoc DMG Amplification, Resonance Skill DMG Amplification ※Obtainable through the [Neptune's Lullaby] Featured Resonator Convene.
**5-Star Resonator: Rover - Aero (Aero/Sword)** Rover has gained a new attribute—Aero, along with all the associated abilities. This new attribute of Rover's is a well-balanced one. Rover: Aero deals Aero DMG to enemies and heals other Resonators with Eye of Tempest. ●Combat Roles: Support and Healer, Resonance Skill DMG, Aero Erosion ※Complete [Main Quest] Chapter II Act IV "The Maiden, The Defier, The Death Crier" to unlock.
**✦New Weapons✦** **5-Star Weapon: Whispers of Sirens (Rectifier)** From the sea, some see stars, some catch the moon, and some hear countless whispers and murmurs. Those murmurs seep into her venom, flowing through every winding river. In the end, the murmurs envelope, like the bell of a jellyfish, like the sea. ※Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation - Whispers of Sirens] Featured Weapon Convene.
**5-Star Weapon: Bloodpact's Pledge (Sword)** This weapon is a testament to the unbreakable blood pact: One shall never betray, never surrender, and fight until the last drop of blood is shed. ※Complete [Main Quest] Chapter II Act IV "The Maiden, The Defier, The Death Crier" to obtain.
**✦New Regions✦** **Avinoleum** Once a theological seminary of Rinascita, it now rests in the boundless expanse of clouds. It once recorded Rinascita's glory and grandeur, along with countless unspeakable secrets. ※Reach the location during [Main Quest] Chapter II Act IV "The Maiden, The Defier, The Death Crier."
**Beohr Waters** Once a sacred land, only a faint shadow of Avinoleum's glory remains. Those destined to fall still live, while those meant to survive lie buried, transformed into divine oracles no one hears. Their lips remain sealed, and Their ears are bound by words They never spoke. ※Reach the location during [Main Quest] Chapter II Act IV "The Maiden, The Defier, The Death Crier."
**●[Avinoleum] New Way of Exploration** [Gravity Calibrator] Gravity Adjustment In Avinoleum, interact with Gravity Calibrators to change the direction of gravity in your surroundings and travel to more areas open to exploration.
[Companion] Shared Adventure For certain tasks in Avinoleum, you and the Companion Resonator can work together to complete them.
**✦New Echoes✦** Reminiscence: Fleurdelys, Capitaneus, La Guardia, Sagittario, Sacerdos, Glacio Drake, Electro Drake, Aero Drake, Nightmare: Lampylumen Myriad
● New Sonata Set: Gusts of Welkin Gusts of Welkin (2pcs Set): Aero DMG + 10% Gusts of Welkin (5pcs Set): Inflicting Aero Erosion on enemies increases Aero DMG for all Resonators in the team by 15%, and for the Resonator triggering this effect by an additional 15%, lasting for 20s.
**✦New Stories✦** **[Main Quest] Chapter II Act IV "The Maiden, The Defier, The Death Crier"** After the Carnevale, a voice in your head leads you to the supposed Martyred Maiden—Cartethyia. The encounter creates more questions than it answers. Who are your enemies? Who are your friends? Where is the Inverted Tower located? The helper Carlotta has found and the invitation from Fisalia may help you answer all these questions. The moment of truth seems inevitable... ✦Duration: Permanently available after the Version 2.2 update. ✦Eligibility: Complete [Main Quest] Chapter II Act III "What Yesterday Wept, Today Doth Sing."
**[Cantarella's Companion Story] A Fleeting Night's Dream** A mysterious letter gently lifts a corner of the veil that shrouds the nights gone by. A faint whisper from the depths of the abyss waits for your reply. ✦Duration: Permanently available after the Version 2.2 update. ✦Eligibility: Reach Union Level 20 and complete Main Quest Chapter II Act IV "The Maiden, The Defier, The Death Crier."
**[Exploration Quest] Should the Shooting Stars Blaze** You find a mysterious "light spark." Follow this little spark, and you may witness the shooting stars blaze. ✦Duration: Permanently available after the Version 2.2 update. ✦Eligibility: Complete [Main Quest] Chapter II Act IV "The Maiden, The Defier, The Death Crier."
**✦New Events & Gameplay Features✦** **●Special Events:** [Avinoleum] Area Events Participate in Area Exploration Event "Winds of the Past" to explore the area and win rewards. Participate in Featured Exploration Event "Avinoleum Travel Atlas" to increase Exploration Progress for the new region and win Astrites and Premium Tuners. Participate in Photo Collection Event "Acropolis Documentarian" to capture beautiful moments in Avinoleum. ✦Duration: Version 2.2 update - 2025-04-28 03:59 (server time)
**[Virtual Crisis: Prototype Trials] Crisis Trial Challenge Event** As a member of the Black Shores, take on Crisis Trial challenges and high-difficulty Disaster Trial challenges under various combinations of Stress Modules. ✦Duration: 2025-04-03 10:00 - 2025-04-28 03:59 (server time)
**[If You Gaze Into the Abyss of Dreams] Featured Co-op Combat Event** A girl called Dorothy appears next to a mysterious gate. She claims a sudden crisis is taking place inside. ✦Duration: 2025-04-17 10:00 - 2025-04-28 03:59 (server time)
**[Lollo Campaign: Set Sail] Featured Commission Event** Maji, your entrepreneurial friend, has made his way across the sea to Ragunna. It seems he's stumbled upon a golden opportunity, and he's eager to get you on board. ✦Duration: 2025-04-10 10:00 - 2025-04-24 03:59 (server time)
**[Ragunna Weather Forecast] Featured Platforming Event** KU-Ryan, a Black Shores robot, is currently looking for help in gathering Surveillance Datasets on Waveworn Phenomena in Ragunna. ✦Duration: 2025-04-10 10:00 - 2025-04-24 03:59 (server time)
**[Wuthering Exploration] Featured Exploration Event: Whisperwind Haven** Complete Survey Tasks daily to get Survey Points and claim rewards after meeting Survey Point requirements. ✦Duration: 2025-04-14 04:00 - 2025-04-28 03:59 (server time)
**[Gifts of the Still Tides] 7-Day Login Event** During the event, log in daily to claim the day's login rewards. ✦Rewards: Radiant Tide x5, Lustrous Tide x5 ✦Duration: Version 2.2 update - 2025-04-28 03:59 (server time)
**✦Other✦** ●[Tactical Hologram: Phantom Pain] Challenge: Dragon of Dirge ●[Titles]: Meet specific requirements to obtain honorary titles ●[Phantom Echo]: Phantom - Capitaneus ※Complete Exploration Quest "Should the Shooting Stars Blaze" to obtain Phantom: Capitaneus.
**[Adjustments and Optimizations]** **✦Resonators & Weapons✦** - Optimized the model performance for the back of Jinhsi's Outfit "Peach Blossom."
**✦Features✦** **●Profile** **New feature: Titles** - View or change your Title via Terminal> Profile > Change Title - Available Titles and their respective Unlock requirements are displayed on the Change Title page. - Challenge Records before and after certain Titles are obtained will be displayed on the page. The Records will be updated if new ones are achieved. - More Titles will be added in future versions.
**●Story** **New feature: Story Review** - During a scene, press the icon in the top right corner of the screen to access Story Review. - This feature allows you to replay previously voiced lines and view their subtitles. - To access more storyline content, go to Terminal > Gallery > Main Story.
**●Map** - Added a "Switch Gravity" view option to the Map for Avinoleum. - Added Switch Gravity-related Markers for Avinoleum. - Added icons on the Map to show certain undiscovered gameplay content. - Added the option to Track and Fast Travel to Collection Spots and locations marked with Lootmappers or Custom Markers. - Adjusted the order of Regions displayed when "Switch Map" is pressed. Newer Regions will be displayed first. Adjusted the rules under which certain red dots appear on the Map. A red dot will still appear if there are unclaimed rewards.
**✦Leveling✦** **●Materials for Leveling** Added Quick Access to Supplies in Backpack: - Select "Supply Pack" on the "How to Get" menu when leveling up to open Supply Packs which contain the required Material. - If you have multiple Supply Packs that contain the required Material, the one with the lowest number of options will be opened first.
**✦Challenges, Puzzles, & Events✦** **●Whimpering Wastes** - Optimized the event page for Whimpering Wastes when the event is still locked. - Adjusted the Environment Report effects in the current iteration of "Respawning Waters: Torrents - Infinite Torrents." - Adjusted the Bonuses granted by the Tokens "The Revelry that Unveils Mysteries" and "The Blood Pact that Corrupts to the Core." ※Please note that the adjustments to Whimpering Wastes take effect after the maintenance update for Version 2.2 concludes.
- Adjusted the gameplay tutorial text for Nightmare Cloud.
**✦Controls✦** - Added Controller vibration feedback when casting certain COST4 Echo Skills. - Enhanced the visual contrast in Controller mode between selected and unselected content on certain pages. - Added a button to the Activity screen that makes it easier to claim rewards when using a Controller. - Optimized the experience when using Controller thumbsticks to move in-game sliders, reducing the likelihood of a slider bouncing back after being moved to the end of the slider. - Optimized the Conversion process in Synthesis when using a Controller.
**✦UI✦** - Optimized the functionality of red dots on the Events page. Clicking red dots on the Events page now scrolls you to events with corresponding red dots. - Adjusted the sizes of icons in the top left corner of the Map screen that provide access to various Exploration Progress-related tasks.
**✦Graphics & Performance✦** **●Graphics Settings** **Added Color Settings** - Adjust the Color Settings via Settings > Graphics > Basic > Color Settings - The options "Saturation" and "Contrast" are now available, in addition to "Brightness." - Images are provided for reference to show the effects of different Settings. ※Please note that the Brightness value will be reset to the default 50 following the Version 2.2 update. If you set a Brightness value that is different from this default option, please readjust the value accordingly following the update.
**Added notices regarding Frame Generation settings** - If Hardware-Accelerated GPU Scheduling is not enabled on Windows, the "Frame Generation" option will be reset to "Off" following the Version 2.2 update. To turn on the Frame Generation option, enable the "Hardware-Accelerated GPU Scheduling" option via "Settings > System > Display > Graphics Settings" on Windows and then reboot your PC. - In the current version, the Frame Generation option is available for devices equipped with the NVIDIA RTX 40 series or later.
**Added an On/Off option for Co-op Teammate VFX** Turn this feature on or off via Settings > Graphics > Custom
- Added physics effects to fabric, making fabric in certain scenes appear more realistic. - Added the 120 FPS option for certain Mac models. This option is now available for Mac devices equipped with M3 Pro, M3 Max, M4, or M4 Pro processors. - Optimized Ray Tracing in certain scenes. - Optimized the efficiency of the shader compilation process and the hardware resource usage on PC. - Optimized the visual effects for fog and cloud under certain settings on PC.
**✦Other✦** **●Title Screen** **New feature: Network Test** - If you encounter network-related issues, such as failure to log in, you now have the option of performing a network test via Tools > Network Test on the title screen. - The network testing process may take some time. - If needed, you can report the network testing results and contact Customer Service to help us better identify the issue.
- Optimized the log-in process and the process of entering or exiting the title screen, reducing the time required to log into and enter the game. - Increased the number of Waypoints that can be deployed simultaneously to 10. - Increased the number of Casket Sonar that can be deployed simultaneously to 5. - Optimized the descriptions of certain in-game settings and functions.
**[Bug Fixes]** **●Resonators & Weapons** - Fixed an issue with enemy targeting when Resonator Brant performed Mid-air Attack 1. - Fixed an issue where Resonator Brant might be downed without taking damage while performing Basic Attack 4. - Fixed an issue with the effective DMG range of Resonator Brant's Resonance Skill "Returned from Ashes." - Fixed an issue with Resonator Brant's movements while casting Resonance Skill "Returned from Ashes." - Fixed an issue with some of Resonator Phoebe's Idle Animations in Camera mode. - Fixed an issue where the Greeting voiceline was missing from Resonator Phoebe's "Information - Voice" page. - Fixed an issue with the shadow of Resonator Phoebe's character model under certain circumstances. - Fixed a clipping issue that affected Resonator Roccia's outfit when she made certain motions. - Fixed an issue where the color at the edge of Resonator Carlotta's character model might appear abnormal under certain graphics settings. - Fixed an issue where Resonator Carlotta's character model might behave abnormally when Substance was full. - Fixed a clipping issue that affected Resonator Carlotta's outfit when she's climbing. - Fixed an issue where Resonator Shorekeeper's Outro Skill failed to take effect correctly in Co-op mode. - Fixed an issue where Inklit Spirits, triggered after Resonator Zhezhi casts Resonance Liberation "Living Canvas," appeared abnormal under certain circumstances. - Fixed an issue where after activating the fifth node of Resonator Jianxin's Resonance Chain "Mirroring Introspection," the buff "Damage from Purification Force Field is increased by 80%" from the fourth node "Multitide Reflection" does not take effect when the Resonator casts Resonance Liberation. - Fixed an issue where the coloring at the edge of Resonator Jianxin's character model might appear abnormal. - Fixed an issue where the model for Unflickering Valor appeared abnormal when the weapon was equipped on certain Resonators. - Fixed an issue where the of DoT from Spectro Frazzle Effect was abnormal under certain circumstances.
**●Enemies & Echoes** - Fixed an issue where casting the Echo Skill "Lorelei" in mid-air caused Lorelei to continue falling while the transformation was still in effect. - Fixed an issue where a Resonator could not perform Counterattack while using the Echo Skill "Lorelei." - Fixed an issue with the model for the Echo "Phantom: Lorelei." - Fixed an issue where casting Lumiscale Construct against an Enemy's Special Skill prevented Counter Skill from being triggered. - Fixed an issue where certain buffs and debuffs did not take effect for a Resonator who transformed into a Carapace. - Fixed an issue where during the fight with Dragon of Dirge, the enemy's movements might become abnormal after casting certain skills. - Corrected the discrepancy between the actual DMG dealt by the Echo "Hoochief" and the associated description.
**●Features** - Fixed an issue where the Gallery - Sceneries screen flashed on certain mobile devices. - Fixed an issue where defeating certain Tacet Discords detected via Echo Hunting did not direct the player to the tracking of a new Tacet Discord. - Fixed an issue where using Grapple while floating in water might cause you to sink. - Fixed an issue where clicking the "zoom in to my current location" icon in the bottom right corner of the "Map - Switch Map" screen did nothing in certain circumstances. - Fixed an issue where zooming in and out of the Map caused certain Markers on the Mini Map to appear abnormal. - Fixed an issue where some Rovers were not able to bring up the cursor after a black screen. - Fixed an issue where friends added on the PS5 do not appear on the friend list after switching to PC.
**●Challenges, Puzzles, & Events** - Fixed an issue in "Old Man and the Whale" where the special effects for "Fast Travel to Dock" might appear defective. - Fixed an issue in "Old Man and the Whale" where some of the items displayed on the preview page for the event were incorrect. - Fixed an issue where the Dock icon associated with "Old Man and the Whale" might appear on the main screen when not in the Riccioli Islands area. - Fixed an issue in Tactical Hologram: Phantom Pain where multiple enemies could be summoned under certain circumstances. - Fixed an issue in Whimpering Wastes with the attribute damage resistance of the enemies "Violet-Feathered Heron" and "Rocksteady Guardian." - Fixed an issue in Whimpering Wastes where dealing DMG to Cuddle Wuddle was impossible within a certain period after the enemy performed a Synergy attack. - Fixed an issue in Whimpering Wastes where a new wave of enemies might appear and remain on the scene after the countdown ended. - Fixed an issue in Whimpering Wastes where certain enemies had abnormal resistance to interruption. - Corrected the discrepancy between the actual effects of Buffs and the associated descriptions for Riccioli Islands Tacet Field challenges. - Fixed an issue where Dream Patrol that belongs to a different location was triggered in the "Rinascita - Vault Underground" area. - Fixed an issue in "Echo Challenge: Clear Cloud" where transforming into Lottie Lost was impossible under certain circumstances. - Fixed an issue in "Echo Challenge: Unfinished Book" where the text for the conversation with the NPC "Fratellino" contained errors. - Fixed an issue in "Echo Challenge: Plushie Punch" where exiting the domain was impossible under certain circumstances.
**●Controls** - Fixed an issue where using a Controller made content on certain pages incomplete. - Fixed an issue where the Echo Recommendation page could not be turned off if a Controller was used under certain Resolution settings.
**●Graphics & Performance** - Fixed an issue where the models for certain Map areas and certain Resonators might appear blurry on PC. - Fixed an issue where, with the Ray Tracing option turned on, the loading process might crash while trying to log in. ※To ensure a smooth performance, if your device has 16 GB of RAM, after turning Ray Tracing on, please restart the game once the shaders have finished compiling. We will make more optimizations in this regard in future versions.
**●Quests** - Fixed an issue in Companion Story "Sail Day, Captain!" where certain parts of the background music might be missing. - Corrected textual errors in the outline of Side Quest "Dream Patrol II." - Fixed an issue in "Amidst the Stars - Record the last location for KU-Cass" where interaction could not be initiated at the task location, preventing quest progression. - Fixed an issue in Side Quest "Camp Raid" where the NPCs might not appear, preventing quest progression. - Fixed an issue in "Cerulean Echoes Adrift in the Winds: Part I - Clear the corrupted data" where the corrupted data might not appear at the task location, preventing quest progression.
**●Environment** - Fixed an issue where certain NPCs in the "Rinascita - Riccioli Islands" area floated in mid-air. - Fixed an issue where certain NPCs in Rinascita have abnormal walking routes. - Fixed an issue where certain NPC models in the Rinascita - Ragunna area behave abnormally. - Fixed an issue where certain visual assets in the "Rinascita - Nimbus Sanctum - Atrium of Reflections" area appeared outside the bounds of the map. - Fixed an issue where certain Gondolas in Rinascita might not appear. - Fixed an issue with certain objection interactions in the "End of Wandering" domain. - Resolved known issues regarding visual asset abnormalities.

entry.title: [Virtual Crisis: Prototype Trials] Crisis Trial Challenge Event
entry.content:
The Black Shores has developed a special training program that can simulate dangerous trials in Solaris by using Tethys system data. The program is a good measure of the challenger's combat capabilities under adverse conditions.
✦Duration✦ 2025-04-03 10:00 - 2025-04-28 03:59 (server time)
✦Rewards✦ Astrite x500, Malleable Elite Class Echo Ⅴ x1, Malleable Elite Class Echo Ⅵ x1, Premium Tuner x200, Shell Credit x380,000, and other Materials.
✦Eligibility✦ Reach Union Level 30.
✦Event Details✦ - As a member of the Black Shores, take on Crisis Trial challenges and Disaster Trial high-difficulty challenges under various combinations of Stress Modules. - In Crisis Trials, select a Stress Level for each trial. The Stress Level must meet the requirements to complete the trial. Each trial has a default Stress Module. Support Modules are available to lower the trial's difficulty. After completing a Crisis Trial, the corresponding Disaster Trial along with its Stress Module and Support Module will be unlocked. - Disaster Trials have no required Stress Level. Participating in a Disaster Trial will consume Support Modules, so select them carefully in advance. - Obtain Matrix Crystals by completing Challenge Goals in the Crisis and Disaster Trials. Matrix Crystals can be exchanged for rewards at the Supply Station. The Supply Station closes when this event ends. Please exchange your Matrix Crystals in time. - Completing certain Stress Level challenges in Disaster Trials will grant the event-exclusive Title ""Virtual Trailblazer.""
※Certain high-difficulty Stress Modules can only be unlocked after clearing a Disaster Trial. Equipping too many Stress Modules may make the trial excessively challenging. ※If a participant is downed in a trial, they can consume Stress Levels to revive. This also gives a corresponding buff. Please note that consuming Stress Levels will affect the completion and final result of Challenge Goals.

entry.title: Version 2.3: Fiery Arpeggio of Summer Reunion Patch Notes
entry.content:
Dear Rover,
Thank you for your continued support. The following is a summary of content that will become available in Version 2.3: Fiery Arpeggio of Summer Reunion.
[Maintenance Time & Compensation Details]
✦Maintenance Time: 2025-04-29 04:00 - 2025-04-29 11:00 (UTC+8)
✦Maintenance Compensation: Astrite x300, Crystal Solvent x2
✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-04-29 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.
※In the event that the maintenance is extended, the dev team will issue a follow-up notice and adjust the compensation accordingly.
✦Bug Fixes Compensation: Astrite x300
✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-04-29 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.
[Special Notice]
The rewards contained in the "Wuthering Waves Pre-registration and Social Media Follower Milestones Achieved" mail and "A Special Thanks from Wuthering Waves Dev Team" mail expire on 2025-05-22 at 11:59 (UTC+8). Be sure to claim them in time.
New Rovers who create a character and unlock the Mails feature between 2025-05-22 12:00 and 2025-06-12 03:59 (UTC+8), before Version 2.4 goes live, will still receive these two mails, along with the rewards contained within.
※Rovers who created or create a character before 2025-05-22 12:00 (UTC+8) will not receive these two mails again.
✦Eligibility: New Rovers who create a character and unlock the Mail feature between 2025-05-22 12:00 and 2025-06-12 03:59 (UTC+8).
✦Notes:
①The rewards contained in the reissued "A Special Thanks from Wuthering Waves Dev Team" mail will remain claimable until the Version 2.4 update maintenance.
②The reissued "Wuthering Waves Pre-registration and Social Media Follower Milestones Achieved" mail will be marked as a Starred Mail and will remain valid permanently.
③The "A Special Thanks from Wuthering Waves Dev Team" mail contains the item "Voucher of Reciprocal Tides x1." Following the Version 2.4 update maintenance, this item will become invalid, and its associated [Giveback Custom Convene] event will close. Be sure to claim and use the item before 2025-06-12 03:59 (UTC+8).
④Version 2.4 will introduce a feature that allows Rovers who register after the release of Version 2.4 to obtain some of the rewards contained in the above mails by completing beginner quests.
[Version Update Details]
✦New Resonators✦
5-Star Resonator: Zani (Spectro/Gauntlets)
A member of Averardo Vault's security team and holder of "Best Employee" for longer than she cares to count.
She has made plenty of plans for her free time, but for now, her biggest mission is simple: clocking out on time.
●Combat Roles: Main Damage Dealer, Heavy Attack DMG, Spectro DMG Amplification, Spectro Frazzle
※Obtainable through the [Between Light and Shadow] Featured Resonator Convene.
5-Star Resonator: Ciaccona (Aero/Pistols)
A wandering bard from Rinascita, Ciaccona. She sings not only for the Divinity, but also for the common folk.
She records stories along her journeys, turning them into songs that evoke laughter, emotion, and tears in both the storytellers and the audience.
●Combat Roles: Concerto Efficiency, Traction, Aero Erosion
※Obtainable through the [Through Verses and Rhythms] Featured Resonator Convene.
✦New Weapons✦
5-Star Weapon: Blazing Justice (Gauntlets)
It heralds justice, precise and inexorable as a clock's toll. All sins are cleansed in flame, dissipating like night beneath the dawn's gaze.
※Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation - Blazing Justice] Featured Weapon Convene.
5-Star Weapon: Woodland Aria (Pistols)
All things exist within the lines of poetry. Every sound has its meters and rhymes.
The forest's melodies ascend in spirals toward the moon's silvered grace, harmonized by the nightingales' chorus. When the final note falls and vanishes into the silent earth, a flawless chord echoes endlessly in the depths of this boundless realm.
※Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation - Woodland Aria] Featured Weapon Convene.
✦New Stories✦
Zani's Companion Story: A Blaze in the Dark
A case unfolds at midnight, an echo of Ragunna's turbulent past.
Now, the city is once again shrouded in its shadows. Only a blaze of light can banish the encroaching darkness.
✦Duration: Permanently available after the Version 2.3 update.
✦Eligibility: Reach Union Level 20 and complete Main Quest Chapter II Act IV "The Maiden, The Defier, The Death Crier" to unlock.
Event Quest: Your Summer Will Never Wither
A rumor about Daemons is spreading through the streets of Ragunna, with an article pointing to the former Poets Society—The Golden Anthem. As you dig deeper, you uncover a tragic story deliberately concealed by The Order.
✦Duration: 2025-05-22 10:00 - 2025-06-11 11:59 (server time)
✦Eligibility: Reach Union Level 14. Complete Main Quest Chapter II Act III to gain early access. For a better experience, complete Main Quest Chapter II Act IV "The Maiden, The Defier, The Death Crier" first.
✦New Events & Gameplay Features✦
Anniversary Events:
[Cube, Cubic n Cubie] Anniversary Combat Event
The Second Coming of Solaris's Anniversary is approaching, but trouble has struck the Cube World! The mysterious demon king Abbowser has captured all Cubes and challenged the legendary Black Cat Warrior. "Step into the unknown, face my minions, rescue your lost friends, and face me in a big showdown! Come on, it's going to be a blast!"
✦Duration: Version 2.3 Update - 2025-06-11 03:59 (server time)
[Gifts of Grand Celebration] Anniversary Limited-Time Login Event
Log in during the event period to claim the rewards.
✦Duration: 2025-05-23 00:00 (UTC+8) - 2025-06-11 03:59 (server time)
[Cubie Derby] Anniversary Spectator Event
During the event, 12 Cubes will take part in elimination rounds in 2 Groups, with 1 round taking place per day and 10 rounds in total to decide the Ultimate Race Winner.
✦Duration: 2025-05-14 08:00 - 2025-05-26 03:59 (server time)
[Cubie Derby: Warmup] Anniversary Leisure Event
Victory does not come easily. A Cube's got to sweat a little to win the race! Join the Cubes in training, complete practice rounds to earn some exciting rewards!
✦Duration: Version 2.3 Update - 2025-06-11 11:59 (server time)
[Memory Travelogue] Anniversary Photo Collection Event
KU-Lolo has a new idea to turn your fondest memories into unique Cube souvenirs in the Second Coming of Solaris!
✦Duration: Version 2.3 Update - 2025-06-11 03:59 (server time)
[Gilded Nightmarket] Anniversary Points Exchange Event
Complete Nightmarket Tasks to earn Nightmarket Tokens, which can be exchanged for various items in the Gilded Nightmarket.
✦Availability of Nightmarket Tasks: Version 2.3 Update - 2025-06-11 11:59 (server time)
✦Availability of Gilded Nightmarket: Version 2.3 Update - 2025-06-23 03:59 (server time)
Anniversary Web Events:
[Resounding Waves] Anniversary in Numbers
Resounding Waves is an event where you can review the milestones you've achieved over the past year. Do you remember any of them? Participate in the event to access your very own story. After reading the story, you will become eligible for a special anniversary gift.
✦Duration: Version 2.3 Update - 2025-07-23 23:59 (server time)
[It's Carnevale Time!] Anniversary Returnee Invitation Event
The celebration is about to begin. Invite your friends back to join the fun in Rinascita. Complete tasks together to earn Astrites and other rewards!
✦Duration: Version 2.3 Update - 2025-06-11 23:59 (UTC+8)
Special Events:
[Dreaming Deep] Solaris Film Festival
Encounter a variety of events during the Solaris Film Festival. Use Film Rolls to explore stories and reach different endings!
✦Duration: 2025-05-22 04:00 - 2025-08-01 03:59 (server time)
[Your Summer Will Never Wither] Story Event
This is a mini Sonoro Sphere created by Ciaccona's Forte, the Realm of Melodies. In this space, stories of the past replay in fragments, and it takes clues and deduction to get the full picture.
✦Duration: 2025-05-22 10:00 - 2025-06-11 11:59 (server time)
[Beyond the Waves: Rinascita] Featured Exploration Event
Participate and upload your exploration record at the Lollo courier truck to get various rewards!
✦Duration: 2025-05-29 04:00 - 2025-06-11 03:59 (server time)
[Gifts of Grand Reunion] 7-Day Login Event
During the event, log in daily to claim the day's login rewards.
✦Duration: Version 2.3 Update - 2025-06-11 03:59 (server time)
[Gifts of Melodic Verses] Limited-Time Login Event
During the event, log in daily to claim the day's login rewards.
✦Duration: 2025-06-05 04:00 - 2025-06-19 03:59 (server time)
✦Other New Content✦
● [Tactical Hologram: Phantom Pain] Challenges: Fleurdelys, Lorelei
● [Phantom Echoes]: Phantom - Nimbus Wraith, Phantom - Chest Mimic, Phantom - Crownless, Phantom - Nightmare Crownless
[Anniversary Specials]
Flight Aspect: The Laureate
※Participate in [Cubie Derby: Warmup] Anniversary Leisure Event to obtain
Avatar: Moment of Resonance
※Participate in [Gifts of Grand Celebration] Anniversary Limited-Time Login Event to obtain
Sigil: Once Together
※Participate in [Cube, Cubic n Cubie] Anniversary Combat Event to obtain.
[Limited-Time Rewards from Past Events]
Projection: Somnoire Anchor, Projection: Ocean's Gift, Phantom: Dreamless, Phantom: Inferno Rider, Phantom: Lorelei
※Participate in [Gilded Nightmarket] Anniversary Points Exchange Event to obtain."
[Adjustments and Optimizations]
✦Resonators & Weapons✦
● Echo Aspect
New Feature: Echo Aspect
- This feature allows you to apply Glide or Flight Aspects to your Resonators.
- You can apply an Echo Aspect to the current Resonator or all the Resonators.
- Glide or Flight Aspects do not affect Resonators' performance.
✦Enemies & Echoes✦
- Optimized the performance of the model for the enemy Fleurdelys in Weekly Challenge: The Wheel of Broken Fate.
- Optimized the visual effects of the Echo skill "Reminiscence: Fleurdelys" in combat.
✦Features✦
● Profile
New Feature: Birthday Blessing
- Set your date of birth via Terminal > Profile > Set Birthday.
- Once you've set your date of birth and reached Union Level 2, the Birthday Blessing feature will be unlocked.
- Log in on the day of your birthday or within 7 days after to receive a unique birthday surprise.
- If you log in after the 7 days have passed but still within 30 days after your birthday, the gift will still be sent to you via Mail.
- If your birthday has already passed when you finish the initial birthdate setting, you can still receive the birthday blessings and gift for the current year via in-game mail.
- You can return to the birthday space anytime by using the Supermassive Birthday Cake in your Backpack.
- You can go to your Backpack to put on the special birthday gift "The Stars that Shine For You."
※Please note that your date of birth cannot be changed once set. Be sure to enter the correct date.
● Story
New Feature: Glossary
- Underlined hyperlinks are added to in-game terminology during quests.
- Clicking on a hyperlinked term will bring up its definition.
● Reprise of Tides
Upgraded [Reprise of Tides] Returnee Event
- Added new 7-Day Login and Returnee Quests, available to Rovers who have not logged in for 60 consecutive days or more.
- Added Progress Rewards.
- Added Double Drop.
- Added Returnee Bundles.
- Added a Returnee Feedback Survey.
- Adjusted the requirements for certain Returnee Quests and Tide Note.
- Optimized the UI design of certain pages.
※For more details about the optimizations made to Reprise of Tides, please refer to the Returnee Event Upgrade Notice.
● Pioneer Podcast
Upgraded Pioneer Podcast
- Increased the quantity and overall Rarity of Public Channel and Insider Channel materials.
- Added new Public Channel and Insider Channel rewards for certain levels.
- Added a new options to open Pioneer Podcast Supply Packs.
- Added a new Connoisseur Channel reward.
- Adjusted the Podcast Task rewards.
- Adjusted the weekly Podcast EXP limit.
- Optimized the display of Insider Channel rewards.
※For more details on the optimizations made to Pioneer Podcast, please refer to the Pioneer Podcast Event Details.
✦Leveling✦
● Data Bank
New Feature: Data Modification
- Visit the page via Terminal > Data Bank > Data Modification.
- Use a Modifier to adjust the first Mainstat of an unenhanced 5-star Echo into the designated stat.
- Echoes that have been modified will be locked automatically.
※After Version 2.3 goes live, the following rewards will be provided to try out the Data Modification feature: Modifier x3, Crystal Solvent x2. To claim them, create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-04-29 04:00 (UTC+8); the rewards will remain claimable until the next version update.
✦Challenges, Puzzles, & Events✦
● Enemy Respawn
Adjustments to Boss Challenges and Nightmare Echo Challenges
- Adjusted the respawn mechanics of Boss Challenges. After defeating an enemy, you can select between "Claim Rewards" and "Restart." If you select "Restart," the enemy will reappear immediately.
- Adjusted the respawn mechanics of Nightmare Echo Challenges. After an enemy is defeated, it will respawn if you wait for a few seconds.
● Fantasies of the Thousand Gateways (Weekly Combat Challenge)
Adjustments to Fantasies of the Thousand Gateways
- Adjusted the effects and descriptions of certain Metaphors. This adjustment will take effect when Version 2.3 goes live.
- Adjusted the amount of Dreamscape Energy that can be obtained in certain situations, making them easier to obtain. Please note that this adjustment will take effect after 2025-06-02 04:00.
- Adjusted some of the instructional text in Tutorials.
- Optimized the quest guide for Echo Challenge: Clear Cloud.
✦Controls✦
● Auto Sprint
Added Auto Sprint and Sustain Sprint
- Enable the options via Settings > Controls.
- With Auto Sprint enabled, your character will sprint automatically after sprinting for 1.5s.
- With Sustain Sprint enabled, when your character has sprinted for a certain amount of time, the Sustain Sprint icon will appear. When the sprint is sustained, the control input is no longer required.
- Now supports BACKBONE
① Lightning Connector, compatible with iOS.
② Type-C Connector, compatible with both Android and iOS.
- Added prompts on the Settings page for certain buttons when using a Controller.
- Added the option of using left stick on the Controller to navigate the "Obtainable via" panel on the Item Details window.
- Added the option of reassigning the Basic Attack and Dodge buttons on Keyboard & Mouse.
- Improved the precision of cursor movement when using a Controller.
✦UI✦
- Added new loading screens for the corresponding version. The new loading screen will be shown first after a successful login.
✦Graphics & Performance✦
● Graphics Settings
Broader Ray Tracing Support
- In addition to the RTX 40 series and RTX 50 series, Ray Tracing will become available for the following NVIDIA graphics cards:
① RTX 2070 and newer from the RTX 20 series.
② RTX 3060 and newer from the RTX 30 series.
- Ray Tracing will also be available for AMD graphics cards that meet the following requirements:
① Minimum 10 GB VRAM
② Hardware support for Ray Tracing
※Excluding 6700, 6700M, 6700 XT, 6700S, 6750 XT, 6750 GRE, RX 7600, 7600M, 7600 XT, 7600M XT, 7600S, and 7650 GRE.
※The Dev Team is currently working to expand Ray Tracing support to the RX 9000 series. Stay tuned to official announcements for updates on the availability.
- Ray Tracing will also be available for Intel graphics cards that meet the following requirements:
① With at least 10 GB of VRAM
② With hardware that supports Ray Tracing
- Added system checks and prompts regarding your device's ability to support Ray Tracing.
- Added an On/Off option for Ray-Traced Shadows.
- Optimized the performance of the game with Ray Tracing enabled.
- Optimized the effects of Ray-Traced Reflections when Ray Tracing is enabled.
Wider 120 FPS Support
- In addition to the RTX 40 series and RTX 50 series, the 120 FPS option will become available for the following NVIDIA graphics cards:
① RTX 2070s and newer from the RTX 20 series.
② RTX 3060 and newer from the RTX 30 series.
- Made the 120 FPS option available for AMD RX 6600 XT or newer.
※Please note that certain CPU requirements, in addition to the above GPU requirements, need to be met for the 120 FPS option to work.
※Due to variations in the in-game settings and system environment, enabling the 120 FPS option may occasionally cause performance issues, in-game glitches, and hardware-related issues. If you encounter any issue, please try disabling the 120 FPS option. If the issue persists, please contact customer support for further assistance.
- Added the Frame Generation option for mobile devices equipped with Snapdragon 8 Elite.
- Improved game resolution and visual performance for iPads equipped with M1 or newer processors.
✦Other✦
● Pre-download
Added Mobile Pre-download
When pre-downloading for the latest version becomes available, press the ""Pre-download"" button, either on the title screen after a successful login or on the in-game Terminal page to pre-download update resources.
● Selective Download
Added Mobile Selective Download
- This feature is at the testing stage and will be available only on some Android and iOS devices.
- Select between Full Resources and Basic Resources after installing or reinstalling the game.
① Full Resources: Download all the available resources in one go.
② Basic Resources: Basic Resources include only story resources for the early game. The remaining resources may be downloaded in the background as you play in the game.
※Whether or not a selective download panel appears, the game will function normally once the required resources have been downloaded.
※The options Full Resources and Basic Resources differ only in whether the cutscenes (MP4) are downloaded. They have no effect on your experience of the base game.
- Added a panel to the title screen that appears when you download resources for the first time or when the size of the current download is ≥500MB. The panel shows the details of the content that will be downloaded.
- Added a new way of obtaining Seaside Cendrelis. This item can be purchased at Rosemary's Apothecary following the Version 2.3 update.
- Added new Titles in the Title system.
- Adjusted the path stored image path on Mac. Following the Version 2.3 update, you can locate the images you've saved by going to Saved/ScreenShot under the directory in which you've stored your game files.
- Optimized the descriptions of certain in-game settings and functions.
[Bug Fixes]
● Resonators & Weapons
- Fixed an issue where the type of damage dealt by Resonator Cantarella's Heavy Attack was incorrect, preventing the activation of the associated effects.
- Fixed an issue where Resonator Cantarella's character model appeared abnormal when the Resonator was in the water or entered Mirage after performing Heavy Attack, or when the Wounded Effect was triggered.
- Fixed an issue where Cantarella's Tacet Mark might appear abnormal when the Resonator cast Resonance Liberation.
- Fixed an issue where the sound effects for certain of Resonator Cantarella's skills were abnormal.
- Fixed an issue where the buff "Mid-air Attack Multiplier Increases By 30%," granted upon activation of Resonator Brant's Resonance Chain Node 6 "All the World's A Carnevale, Says Brant," failed to take effect under certain circumstances.
- Fixed an issue where the next stage of Mid-air Attack might not occur after Resonator Brant cast Resonance Liberation "To the Last Horizon."
- Fixed an issue where the Resonance Liberation animation might not appear when Resonator Brant cast Resonance Liberation "To the Last Horizon."
- Fixed an issue where the animation for Resonator Brant's Resonance Liberation "To the Last Horizon" might appear abnormal.
- Fixed an issue where the visuals reflected on water surfaces when Resonator Shorekeeper cast Resonance Liberation "End Loop" appeared abnormal with Ray Tracing enabled.
- Fixed an issue in Co-op mode where two instances of Resonator Carlotta's Resonance Liberation "Fatal Finale" could be cast.
- Fixed an issue in Co-op mode where Intro Skill could be cast during Resonance Liberation.
- Fixed an issue where multiple instances of Concerto Energy Recovery or Resonance Energy Recovery might occur when certain skills of Resonators Changli, Jianxin, Rover: Spectro, or Youhu were cast.
- Fixed an issue where after activing Resonator Jianxin's 5th Resonance Chain node "Mirroring Introspection," her Inherent Skill "Formless Release," did not take effect as Resonance Liberation Explosion Damage when she casts Resonance Liberation "Purification Force Field."
- Fixed an issue where the Resonance Liberation sound effects might go missing when certain Resonators cast skills.
● Enemies & Echoes
- Fixed an issue where character models behaved abnormally when getting off a Tubpup.

entry.title: Developer's Notes - Combat System
entry.content:
**Combat In Wuthering Waves**
The combat style of Wuthering Waves can be expressed in the three following aspects: "Fast Pace Action", "Visually Appealing Combat Representation", and "Strategy Oriented Team Building".
You would already have experienced the first two aspects during their initial engagement with the Crownless. Facing such a formidable foe also forces you to quickly master the techniques of offense and evasion as the battle continues, further sensing the intense build-up of tensions as blade and lance collide. You sure will gain a basic understanding of Wuthering Waves' combat system after defeating the Crownless.
**Combat Movesets**
The movesets you would commonly use in combat can be summarized in the following categories:
1. Normal Attack
2. Evasion
3. Resonance Skill
4. Resonance Liberation
5. Resonance Circuit
6. Parry
**1. Normal Attack**
Every Resonator has their own set of Normal Attacks, which not only is the most commonly used means of offense, but also leads to a variety of fighting styles.
Let's take An'ke for example: as her Normal Attack progresses to the 4th stage, an "Emotion Particle" will show up around her. Quickly performing a follow-up Normal Attack within the Particle's duration will initiate an extra attack in the form of an enlarged Wooly. Tapping or clicking the attack button at the correct moment to enhance Normal Attacks brings more rhythm and enjoyment to overall combat, which also gives off the impression that An'ke's usual fighting style is rather orderly and paced, which is a stark contrast to the combat style during her state of frenzy.
A Heavy Attack can be performed by holding down the Normal Attack button. Doing so usually consumes a certain amount of Stamina. However, Pistol-wielding Resonators will instead enter Aim Mode to execute a single, more powerful shot.
In addition to being a much stronger Normal Attack, the Heavy Attack plays a crucial part for some of the Resonators during their combat.
After Taoqi issues a Heavy Attack, she enters the state of "Xuanwu's Defense", having her focus more on defense to reduce the amount of incoming damage by consuming Stamina. Once received enough damage, she dishes out a counterblow and heals her team members in the process.
Sanhua, on the other hand, can detonate "Wall of Ice Picks", "Ice Prisms", and "Glaciers" along the strike path of her Heavy Attack, which coupled with the perfect timing of a Resonance Skill will deal a serious blow to enemies in an instant.
Every Resonator has the capability to conduct attacks whilst midair, yet the methods vary depending on weapon type or the character themselves.
During the limited time after performing his Resonance Skill, Jiyan is able to change his attack style in the air.
As for Chixia and many other Pistol-wielding Resonators, they will lay down continuous fire while in the air until Stamina is depleted.
Some Resonators can even perform midair Heavy Attacks.
**2. Evasion**
By consuming a certain amount of Stamina, the controlling Resonator will perform a rapid Evasion toward the given direction. If no directional command is issued, the Resonator will automatically perform a backward Evasion.
With the added priority granting the Evasion maneuver to interrupt a majority of actions midperformance, you may evade an enemy's attack right before contact, trigger an evasive counterattack, and create more offensive opportunities for yourself.
**3. Resonance Skill**
Each Resonator bears their own unique Resonance Skill, while playing an important role in combat, it is often closely tied with the Resonator's Resonance Circuit and Resonance Liberation. Most Resonators require some time to recover after each use of their Resonance Skill, meaning mastering its timing is of utmost importance. However, there are occasional exceptions.
Danjin consumes a certain amount of her HP each time she performs "Vermilion Shards" arts. Her Resonance Skill requires no recovery time. Arts from "Vermilion Shards" are combined with her Normal Attack, dealing continual damage to foes while recharging her "Scarlet Essence". Once "Scarlet Essence" is fully recharged, Danjin can unleash even more deadly combos of attacks and regenerate her HP.
A style of combat featuring the cycle of consuming and regenerating HP, gives Danjin the power to deal massive amounts of damage to enemies, while simultaneously swaying herself at the edge of danger.
**4. Resonance Liberation**
Resonance Energy can be accumulated by striking a target with the Resonance Skill, or when a Concerto Effect is triggered. Once Resonance Energy reaches its peak, a more powerful Resonance Liberation can be unleashed. Resonance Liberation is generally considered to be the most powerful ability of a Resonator. Activation of this ability can often turn the tide in battles. Besides dealing immense amounts of damage to enemies, Resonance Liberation also can enhance the capabilities of the caster or the entire team within a limited time frame.
For instance, Jiyan will enter his "Triumphant Status" after casting "Sky Roaming - Certitude". His Claymore becomes a lance guiding the Qingloong's path, clearing any threat that poses to Huanglong.
Jueyuan's Resonance Liberation stimulates the growth of vegetation around her, dealing damage to enemies and marking them with "Photosynthesis Sigil". Team members dealing damage to enemies marked with "Photosynthesis Sigil" will receive healing and collaborated attacks from Jueyuan. Jueyuan is a Resonator with combined offense and healing abilities.
**5. Resonance Circuit**
Resonance Circuit is a form of distinctive energy held by Resonators, each Resonator's Resonance Circuit has its unique mechanic. To a certain extent, the Resonance Circuit determines the Resonator's main style of combat, whether it be Normal Attack, Resonance Skill, or Resonance Liberation, all tend to revolve around the effects of the Resonance Circuit. Grasping the Resonance Circuit's application during combat will lead to a better understanding of each Resonator's combat style.
Thus, Rover's combat circulates the collection of "Sound Fragments" through constant strikes and evasions, "Sound Fragments" are then consumed with the use of the Resonance Skill for further damage and restoration of Resonance Energy, preparing for the next Resonance Liberation.
The process is based on the mechanics of Rover's own Resonance Circuit, a complete combat cycle consisting of offense, evasion, and skills is formed.
Each Resonator has their own unique mechanic, which offers players rich combat experience and a feeling of control.
**6. Parry**
In some situations, the enemy's execution of certain skills reveals a Parry opportunity, with a successful Parry disrupting the enemy's attack entirely and yielding surprising results.
**Concerto Between Resonators**
**1. Concerto Effect**
Concerto Energy can be cumulated through dealing direct damage and using Echo Skills. Switching to another Resonator with Concerto Energy fully charged triggers the Concerto Effect of the corresponding Resonance Attribute. This action depletes your Concerto Energy.
Due to differences in Resonance Attributes, there are five types of Concerto Effects: Unison, Ensemble, Sustenance, Legato, and Duet
Each Concerto Effect displays a standalone result during combat, providing substantial support for Rovers during heated situations.
This displays the importance of a reasonable team composition with the right Concerto Effects for the right occasions, putting Rover's strategy in team building to the test as well.
Jiyan (Aero) partnered with Mortefi (Fusion) during combat sets off the "Heat Ensemble" effect, which awards the Resonator on the field with increased Attack and Critical Damage, suiting perfectly with Jiyan's fighting style.
Followed by Mortefi unleashing his Resonance Liberation, all members of the team will be applied with "Vulcan Rhapsody", a status which launches blazing "Fusion Damage" towards enemies with each Resonator's Normal or **Heavy Atack**.
"Heat Ensemble" and "Vulcan Rhapsody", along with Jiyan's "Triumphant Status", a deadly combination that shall leave nothing but destruction for the enemies in its wake.
However, this is merely one of many examples showcasing the effective use of the Concerto Effect. A diverse collection of Resonators and Concerto Effects will enrich your combat experience.
**2. Concerto Skill (QTE)**
Switch Resonators at the moment when Concerto Energy is maxed to carry out the Concerto Skill of the said Resonator. Different Resonators boast different Concerto Skills, appearing on the battlefield in varying ways and locations.
**Conclusion**
In a world ridden with adversity, each Resonator revolves around their own Resonance Circuit and their team's Concerto Effect to resist the unending enemies. Accumulate Concerto Energy through attacks, skills, Echo Abilities, and other means, leading to the triggering of Concerto Effect to enhance the performances of the Resonator on the field. Finally, spend Resonance Energy to cast a powerful Resonance Liberation, dealing the enemy a final blow.
Needless to say, this is only the tip of the iceberg of combat in Wuthering Waves. As you come across numerous Resonators during their journey, more and more combat features await to be uncovered.

entry.title: Wuthering Waves CLOSED BETA TEST Review
entry.content:
Dear Rovers,
It's been a while since the CLOSED BETA TEST concluded and we'd like to keep you updated on the game. First, we would like to extend our sincere gratitude to all that followed our game or participated in the Closed Beta Test. Your satisfaction is our greatest motivation.
Your feedback from in-game messages, social media posts, and surveys is greatly appreciated. We have started follow-up development for Wuthering Waves, in which we will prioritize the following aspects:
**Storyline**
We have received a lot of feedback on the storyline during the CBT. **Future improvements will focus on the storyline, including but not limited to:**
・Rewrite the storylines for some of the main missions and side quests;
・Adjust the personalities of some characters;
・Add English voicelines and improve dubbing quality;
・Optimize cutscene presentation.
We will continuously work on refining the storyline. We hope to improve your experience with the main missions and side quests.
**Localization**
**Localization quality is another focus of future improvement**, as Wuthering Waves will be available globally. We are taking steps to improve the quality of text translation, voicelines, and interactive content.
In addition, more languages will be supported in the future. We look forward to bringing our global audience a better gaming experience.
**Game Art**
We will be improving multiple aspects of the game's art and design according to your feedback during the CBT, **including character design, environment design, UI design issues, and more.**
**Performance**
We plan to **continuously work on** improving the performance issues frequently mentioned in your feedback.
**Listed below are some of our preliminary performance improvement plans:**
・Optimize the game client to reduce lagging, frame drops, and crashes;
・Fix pixelated models, key sensitivity issues, and camera follow;
・Optimize the mobile experience, including making the interface layout, graphics quality, and frame rate customizable.
**Gameplay**
We are further polishing the existing content while developing **new gameplays** for you to enjoy.
**Listed below are some of our preliminary gameplay improvement plans:**
・Further improve the **combat experience**;
・Provide a richer **"Echo" system** with more possibilities;
・Rework the **beginner tutorials**;
・Optimize the **Modulation**system.
**More gameplay updates are already in the works. We will keep working on improving your experience.**
We are also working on other new content in addition to the changes listed above. We will keep bringing you exciting new content to enjoy in Wuthering Waves.
Your valuable feedback will always be greatly appreciated. **Transparency and open communication are our top priorities, and we will take every piece of your feedback seriously.**
**We strive to create an open and positive Wuthering Waves global community for all.** Thank you again for your continued attention. We can't wait to show you an improved version of Wuthering Waves next time. Until then!
Wuthering Waves Dev Team
