Adjustments and Optimizations
✦ Resonators/Enemies/NPCs ✦
1. Optimized the descriptions regarding the regeneration of Judgment Points for Yinlin's Forte Circuit "Chameleon Cipher" to fit the actual effects. 2. Clarified the skill descriptions of Yinlin, Mortefi, and Baizhi by adding descriptions related to Coordinated Attacks to fit the actual effects. 3. Optimized the skill descriptions for Yinlin, Encore, Aalto, and Taoqi to fit the actual effects. 4. Optimized the tutorials in Yinlin's Character Trial. The tip that states Judgment Points can be restored via Resonance Liberation hits has been removed to match the current skill description. 5. Optimized the skill description for Resonator Jiyan's [Mid-air Attack · Banner of Triumph]. This optimization does not affect the actual effect. 6. Optimized the skill description for the Dodge Counter skills of Resonators Rover · Spectro, Jianxin, Sanhua, Danjin, and Chixia. This optimization does not affect the actual effect. 7. Optimized the descriptions of Tambourinist and Mech Abomination Echo Skills, to fit the actual effects. 8. Optimized the description related to Echo [Rocksteady Guardian]'s Echo skill; added a description stating that if an enemy's Special Skill is successfully broken, the character will gain a Shield effect. This optimization does not affect the actual effect. 9. Optimized the distribution of some enemies to prevent them from spawning near deep water areas.
✦ Leveling ✦
Echo Upgrading:
1. Medium Tuners and Advanced Tuners can now be synthesized into higher-grade Tuners with the Synthesis feature. 2. Optimized the gameplay of the Tacet Field and increased the drop rate of Elite Class Echoes. 3. Lowered the Shell Credits required for upgrading Echoes.
Data Bank:
1. Raised the level cap for the Data Bank to Lv. 21. (After reaching Lv. 21, all Echoes dropped will be guaranteed to be of 5-Star Rarity.) 2. You will now be able to gain additional Union EXP when unlocking new Echo entries.
※ During the Version 1.1 update, we will retrospectively reward the Union EXP for the number of Echo entries you have previously unlocked. The compensation will be distributed via in-game mail after the update maintenance.
Daily Activity Points:
1. Increased the number of daily Activity Points tasks to reduce the difficulty of earning Daily Activity Points. 2. Removed Incomplete Echoes from the reward pool for reaching 100 Daily Activity Points. Now, only Overlord Class, Calamity Class, and Elite Class Echoes (COST 3 – COST 4 Echoes) will be rewarded.
✦ System ✦
Map:
Added the Layered Map feature to the new Mt. Firmament area.
Exploration Progress:
1. Some Area Quests will now contribute to Exploration Progress, making it easier to achieve 100% progress in those areas. 2. Expanded the detection range of Lootmapper. 3. You can now track the Area Quests you haven't accepted yet via Map > Exploration Progress > Area Quests.
Gallery:
1. Added the Resonators gallery feature Crossing Stars in Gallery. 2. Added the Main Quests and Companion Stories recap feature in Gallery.
Main Quests:
1. Adjusted the requirement to unlock Main Quest Chapter 1 Act 4: Clashing Blades from Union Lv. 14 to Union Lv. 11. 2. Removed the Union Level requirements to unlock Main Quests Chapter 1 Act 5: Rewinding Raindrops and Act 6: Grand Warstorm. They will now become available once the preceding chapter quests are completed.
✦ Controls ✦
Auto Lock-On:
1. Optimized Resonators' auto lock-on logic to prioritize targeting nearer enemies first. 2. Optimized the auto lock-on logic for certain Echo Skills.
Challenges/Puzzles:
1. Slowed down the flying speed of the Cruisewing the Cruisewing Challenge and extended the time limit. 2. Optimized the interactive experience when picking up Tidal Heritage.
Controller Support:
1. Changed the Chat shortcut key to the Map shortcut key. 2. Optimized the control prompts when using controllers. 3. Added the options to invert the horizontal and vertical camera controls under Settings > Controls. 4. Enabled key remapping for certain buttons on Sony PlayStation controllers.
✦ UI ✦
1. Resonators' Combat Styles can now be checked on the Resonators page and the Lineup page. 2. Resonators' skill descriptions can now be checked on the Lineup page. 3. You can now preview the challenge rewards at different SOL3 Phases in the Guidebook. 4. Optimized the usability and UI display effects of the Chat system. 5. Optimized the UI display of Item Exchange and Bundles in the Store. 6. Optimized the UI display for using the Grappling Hook on mobile devices.
✦ Audio ✦
1. Optimized the volume for some voice lines. 2. Optimized the audio effects when re-triggering voice lines in specific scenarios. 3. Optimized the logic for triggering some NPC voice lines.
✦ Other ✦
1. Increased the redemption limit in the "Item Exchange - Oscillated Coral" Store page for convene items including Radiant Tide, Forging Tide, and Lustrous Tide from 6 to 7 per version. 2. Added more graphics options in Settings > Graphics. 3. Expanded the range of story content that can be skipped. 4. Optimized the interaction experience when starting Tacet Field challenges. Additionally, removed the reward collection animation. 5. Optimized the experience for exiting various pages using the ESC key on PC. 6. Optimized the interaction experience when obtaining new weapons if the Backpack is full. Starting from Version 1.1, if your Backpack's weapon capacity is reached, you will be prompted to free up some space before you can acquire additional weapons via Convene. 7. Optimized the text prompts for using Casket Sonar after collecting all Sonance Caskets. 8. Optimized the filtering method in the Data Merge page. 9. Optimized the descriptions of certain items, such as the cooking material Tea. 10. Optimized the Korean description for Resonator Jiyan's 2nd Resonance Chain [Versatility] and 5th Resonance Chain [Resolution]. This optimization does not affect the actual effect. 11. Optimized the German description for the weapon Stringmaster. This optimization does not affect the actual effect. 12. Optimized the error message (text prompt) for insufficient SOL-3 level in the Co-op Mode for certain languages.
